verse.content: Yesu Kristo, Dawid ba, Abraham ba no awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ.
Abraham woo Isak, na Isak woo Yakob, na Yakob woo Yuda ne ne nuanom.
Yuda ne Tamar woo Peres ne Sera, na Peres woo Hesron, na Hesron woo Ram,
na Ram woo Aminadab, na Aminadab woo Nahson, na Nahson woo Salmon,
na Salmon ne Rahab woo Boas, na Boas ne Rut woo Obed, na Obed woo Yisai,
na Yisai woo Ɔhene Dawid.
Na Dawid ne deɛ kane na ɔyɛ Uria yere no woo Salomo,
na Salomo woo Rehoboam, na Rehoboam woo Abia, na Abia woo Asa,
na Asa woo Yehosafat, na Yehosafat woo Yoram, na Yoram woo Usia,
na Usia woo Yotam, na Yotam woo Ahas, na Ahas woo Hesekia,
na Hesekia woo Manase, na Manase woo Amon, na Amon woo Yosia,
na Yosia woo Yekonia ne ne nuanom, ɛberɛ a wɔfaa wɔn nnommum kɔɔ Babel no mu.
Na wɔtwaa wɔn asu kɔtenaa Babel no akyiri no, Yekonia woo Sealtiel, na Sealtiel woo Serubabel,
na Serubabel woo Abihud, na Abihud woo Eliakim, na Eliakim woo Asor,
na Asor woo Sadok, na Sadok woo Akim, na Akim woo Elihud,
na Elihud woo Eleasa, na Eleasa woo Matan, na Matan woo Yakob,
na Yakob woo Yosef a na ɔyɛ Maria a ɔwoo Yesu a wɔfrɛ no Kristo no ne kunu.

Na awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ a ɛfiri Abraham so de bɛsi Dawid so nyinaa yɛ dunan, na ɛfiri Dawid so de bɛsi sɛ wɔfaa wɔn nnommum kɔɔ Babel no yɛ awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ dunan, na ɛfiri sɛ wɔfaa wɔn nnommum kɔɔ Babel no bɛsi Kristo soɔ no nso yɛ awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ dunan.
Na sɛdeɛ Yesu Kristo awoɔ teɛ nie: Wɔde ne na Maria maa Yosef sɛ asiwayere, na wɔnnya nhyiaa mu no, wɔhunuu sɛ ɔnyem deɛ ɛfiri Honhom Kronkron mu.
Na ne kunu Yosef yɛ onipa tenenee, na ɔmpɛ sɛ ɔgu n’anim ase dwam nti, ɔbɔɔ ne tirim sɛ ɔbɛgyaa no kokoam.
Na ɔredwennwene yeinom ho no, hwɛ, Awurade bɔfoɔ yii ne ho adi kyerɛɛ no wɔ daeɛ mu sɛ: "Yosef, Dawid ba, nsuro sɛ wobɛfa wo yere Maria aba wo nkyɛn; na deɛ ɔnyem no firi Honhom Kronkron mu.
Na ɔbɛwo ɔbabanin, na woato ne din Yesu, ɛfiri sɛ ɔno na ɔbɛgye ne man afiri wɔn bɔne mu.
Na yei nyinaa yɛɛ hɔ, na deɛ Awurade nam odiyifoɔ no so kaeɛ no aba mu sɛ:

block_quote.content: Hwɛ, ababaawa no bɛnyinsɛn, na wawo ɔbabanin,
na wɔato ne din Imanuel,
(a asekyerɛ ne sɛ: Onyankopɔn ne yɛn na ɛwɔ hɔ.)

verse.content: Na Yosef firii nna mu nyaneeɛ no, ɔyɛɛ sɛdeɛ Awurade bɔfoɔ no hyɛɛ no no, na ɔkɔfaa ne yere no baa ne nkyɛn.
Na Yosef ne no anhyia mu de kɔsii da a ɔwoo ɔbabanin; na ɔtoo ne din Yesu.
Na wɔwoo Yesu Betlehem a ɛwɔ Yudea, Ɔhene Herode berɛ so no, hwɛ anyansafoɔ bi firi Apueeɛ baa Yerusalem
bisaa sɛ: Ɛhe na Yudafoɔ hene a wɔawo no no wɔ? Na yɛahunu ne nsoromma wɔ Apueeɛ, na yɛreba abɛkoto no.
Na Ɔhene Herode teeɛ no, ɔne Yerusalemfoɔ nyinaa akoma tui;
na ɔhyiaa ɔman no mu asɔfoɔ mpanimfoɔ ne Atwerɛfoɔ nyinaa bisaa wɔn faako a wɔbɛwo Kristo
no.
Na wɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Betlehem a ɛwɔ Yudea; na saa ara na odiyifoɔ no atwerɛ sɛ:

block_quote.content: Na wo Betlehem, Yuda asase,
wonyɛ Yuda asafohene mu akumaa,
ɛfiri sɛ wo mu na ɔsafohene
a ɔbɛhwɛ me man Israel so no bɛfiri aba.

verse.content: Ɛnna Herode frɛɛ anyansafoɔ no kokoam, bisaa wɔn berɛ ko a nsoromma no firiiɛ no yie.
Afei ɔsomaa wɔn Betlehem sɛ: Monkɔ nkɔhwehwɛ abɔfra no yie; na sɛ monya hu no a, mommɛka nkyerɛ me, na me nso menkɔ nkɔkoto no bi.
Na wɔtiee ɔhene asɛm no wieeɛ no, wɔsii mu kɔe; na hwɛ, nsoromma a wɔhunuu no Apueeɛ no dii wɔn anim ara de kɔsii sɛ ɛkɔgyinaa faako a abɔfra no wɔ no atifi.
Na wɔhunuu nsoromma no no, wɔn ani gyee kɛseɛ pa ara.
Na wɔkɔɔ dan no mu no, wɔhunuu abɔfra no ne ne na Maria, na wɔkoto sɔree no; na wɔbuee wɔn fotoɔ mu yɛɛ no ayɛ, sika kɔkɔɔ ne ohwamfufuo ne korɔbɔ.
Na wɔyi kyerɛɛ wɔn daeɛ mu sɛ wɔnnsane nnkɔ Herode hɔ bio no, wɔfaa ɔkwan foforɔ bi so sane kɔɔ wɔn kurom.

Na wɔfiri hɔ kɔeɛ no, hwɛ, Awurade bɔfoɔ bi yii ne ho kyerɛɛ Yosef wɔ daeɛ mu sɛ: Sɔre fa abɔfra no ne ne na, na dwane kɔ Misraim, na kɔtena hɔ kɔsi sɛ mɛka makyerɛ woɔ; na Herode rebɛhwehwɛ abɔfra no aku no.
Na ɔsɔre faa abɔfra no ne ne na anadwo, na ɔfirii hɔ kɔɔ Misraim,
na ɔwɔ hɔ ara kɔsii sɛ Herode wuiɛ; na deɛ Awurade nam odiyifoɔ no so kaeɛ no aba mu sɛ: Mafrɛ me ba afiri Misraim.

Na Herode hunuu sɛ anyansafoɔ no agoro ne ho no, ne bo fuu pii; na ɔsoma maa wɔkɔkunkumm mmɔfra a wɔwɔ Betlehem ne n’ahyeɛ so a wɔadi mfeɛ mmienu ne wɔn a wɔnnya nniiɛ nyinaa, sɛdeɛ berɛ no a ɔbisabisaa anyansafoɔ no kyerɛ.
Ɛnna deɛ Odiyifoɔ Yeremia kaeɛ no baa mu sɛ:

block_quote.content: Wɔtee nne bi Rama,
esu ne awerɛhoɔ kɛseɛ;
Rahel resu ne mma,
na ɔmpɛ sɛ wɔkyekyere ne werɛ,
ɛfiri sɛ wɔnni hɔ.

verse.content: Na Herode wuiɛ no, hwɛ, Awurade bɔfoɔ yii ne ho kyerɛɛ Yosef daeɛ mu wɔ Misraim
sɛ: Sɔre fa abɔfra no ne ne na, na kɔ Israel asase so; na wɔn a na wɔhwehwɛ abɔfra no akum no no awu.
Na ɔsɔre faa abɔfra no ne ne na, na ɔbaa Israel asase so.
Na ɔtee sɛ Arkelao di Yudea hene n’agya Herode ananmu no, ɔsuroo sɛ ɔbɛkɔ hɔ; na wɔyi kyerɛɛ no daeɛ mu no, ɔmane faa Galilea fam.
Na ɔba bɛtenaa kuro bi a wɔfrɛ no Nasaret mu, na deɛ odiyifoɔ no kaeɛ no aba mu sɛ: Wɔbɛfrɛ no Nasareni.
Na nna no mu no, Yohane a ɔyɛ osuboni no ba bɛkaa asɛm wɔ Yudea serɛ so
sɛ: Monsakyera mo adwene; na ɔsoro ahennie no abɛn.
Na oyi ne deɛ Odiyifoɔ Yesaia kaa ne ho asɛm sɛ:

block_quote.content: Obi nne reteam wɔ ɛserɛ so sɛ:
Monsiesie Awurade kwan!
Momma n’atempɔn ntene!

verse.content: Nso na Yohane yi fira ntoma a wɔde yoma nwi na ayɛ, na nwoma abɔsoɔ bɔ n’asene, na n’aduane ne ntutummɛ ne wiram woɔ.
Ɛnna Yerusalemfoɔ ne Yudeafoɔ nyinaa ne Yordan ho asase nyinaa sofoɔ firi kɔɔ ne nkyɛn;
na wɔkaa wɔn bɔne maa no bɔɔ wɔn asu wɔ Asubɔnten Yordan mu.
Na Yohane hunuu Farisifoɔ ne Sadukifoɔ no mu bebree sɛ wɔreba asubɔ no ho no, ɔsee wɔn sɛ: Nhuritia mma! Hwan na ɔkyerɛɛ mo sɛ monnwane mfiri abufuo a ɛreba no ho?
Ɛnneɛ monso aba a ɛkyerɛ adwensakyera.
Na monnsusu nnka no mo mu sɛ: Yɛn agya ne Abraham; na mereka makyerɛ mo sɛ: Onyankopɔn bɛtumi anyane mma afiri aboɔ yi mu ama Abraham.
Nanso wɔde akuma no ato nnua no nhini ho dada; enti dua biara a ɛnso aba pa no, wɔbɛtwa ato ogya mu.
Me deɛ, mebɔ mo asu wɔ nsuo mu kɔ adwensakyera mu, na deɛ ɔdi m’akyi reba no deɛ, ɔkorɔn kyɛn me; na ne mpaboa mpo, mensɛ sɛ mekura. Ɔno na ɔbɛbɔ mo asu Honhom Kronkron ne ogya mu.
Ɔno na ne nhusoɔ apaawa kuta ne nsam, na ɔbɛpra aporoeɛ hɔ fitaa. Ɔbɛboaboa n’ayuo ano akɔgu san so, na ntɛtɛ no deɛ, ɔde ogya a ɛnnum da bɛhye.
Ɛnna Yesu firi Galilea baa Yordan ho, Yohane nkyɛn sɛ ɔmmɔ no asu.
Na ɔno deɛ, ɔsii no kwan sɛ: Me mmom a ɛhia me sɛ wobɔ me asu no na woreba me nkyɛn yi?
Na Yesu bua see no sɛ:

wj.content: Seesei deɛ, ma ho kwan; na ɛnam yei so na yɛhyɛ tenenee nyinaa ma.

verse.content: Ɛnna ɔmaa no kwan.
Na wɔbɔɔ Yesu asu wieeɛ no, ɔfirii nsuo no mu, hwɛ, ntɛm ara na ɔsoro bue maa no, na ɔhunuu Nyankopɔn Honhom sɛ ɛresiane sɛ aburuburo ba ne soɔ.
Na hwɛ, ɛnne bi firi soro kaa sɛ: Oyi ne me Dɔba a ɔsɔ m’ani.
Ɛnna Honhom no de Yesu kɔɔ serɛ so sɛ ɔbonsam nkɔsɔ no nhwɛ.
Na ɔdii mmuada adaduanan awia ne anadwo no, akyire yi no, ɛkɔm dee no.
Na ɔsɔhwɛfoɔ no baa ne nkyɛn bɛsee no sɛ: Sɛ wone Nyankopɔn Ba no a, kasa na aboɔ yi nnane paanoo.
Na ɔbuaa sɛ:

wj.content: Wɔatwerɛ sɛ:
Ɛnyɛ paanoo nko na onipa nam so bɛtena aseɛ,
na mmom asɛm biara a ɛfiri Nyankopɔn anomu ba no so.

verse.content: Ɛnna ɔbonsam de no kɔɔ kuro kronkron no mu, na ɔde no kɔgyinaa asɔrefie no atifi,
na ɔsee no sɛ: Sɛ wone Nyankopɔn ba no a, to wo ho twene fam; na wɔatwerɛ sɛ:

block_quote.content: Wo nti, ɔbɛhyɛ n’abɔfoɔ,
na wɔabɛsoa wo wɔn nsam,
na woamfa wo nan ampem boɔ.

verse.content: Yesu see no sɛ:

wj.content: Wɔatwerɛ bio sɛ: Nsɔ Awurade, wo Nyankopɔn, nhwɛ!

verse.content: Na ɔbonsam faa no bio kɔɔ bepɔ tenteenten bi so, na ɔkyerɛɛ no wiase ahennie nyinaa ne emu animuonyam,
na ɔsee no sɛ: Sɛ wobɛkoto asɔre me a, anka mede yeinom nyinaa bɛma wo.
Ɛnna Yesu see no sɛ:

wj.content: Firi hɔ, Satan! na wɔatwerɛ sɛ:
Koto sɔre Awurade, wo Nyankopɔn,
na ɔno nko ara na som no.

verse.content: C Ɛnna ɔbonsam gyaa no hɔ, na hwɛ, abɔfoɔ ba bɛsomm no.
Na Yesu tee sɛ wɔakyere Yohane no, ɔsii mu kɔɔ Galilea.
Na ɔfirii Nasaret kɔtenaa Kapernaum a ɛwɔ mpoano, Sebulon ne Naftali ahyeɛ so,
na deɛ Odiyifoɔ Yesaia kaeɛ no aba mu sɛ:

block_quote.content: Sebulon asase ne Naftali asase,
ɛpo kwan so, Yordan agya, amanaman Galilea,
ɔman a wɔte sum mu no
hunuu hann kɛseɛ bi
na wɔn a wɔte owuo asase soɔ ne ne sunsum mu no,
hann bi apue ama wɔn.

verse.content: Ɛfiri saa berɛ no, Yesu firii aseɛ kaa asɛm sɛ:

wj.content: Monsakyera mo adwene; na ɔsoro ahennie no abɛn.

verse.content: Na Yesu nenam Galilea po ho no, ɔhunuu anuanom baanu, Simon a wɔfrɛ no Petro ne ne nua Andrea, sɛ wɔregu asau ɛpo no mu; na wɔyɛ apofofoɔ.
Na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Mommɛdi m’akyi, na mɛma moayɛ nnipa yifoɔ.

verse.content: Na ntɛm ara wɔgyaa wɔn asau no hɔ, bɛdii n’akyi.
Na ɔfiri hɔ kɔɔ n’anim no, ɔhunuu anuanom baanu bio, Sebedeo ba Yakobo ne ne nua Yohane, sɛ wɔne wɔn agya Sebedeo te kodoɔ mu repempam wɔn asau; na ɔfrɛɛ wɔn.
Na ntɛm ara wɔgyaa kodoɔ no ne wɔn agya hɔ bɛdii n’akyi.
Na Yesu kyinii Galilea nyinaa, kyerɛkyerɛe wɔn hyia adan mu, na ɔkaa ahennie no ho asɛmpa no, na ɔsaa yadeɛ ne ahoɔmmerɛ biara ɔman no mu.

Na ne ho asɛm trɛ kɔɔ Siria nyinaa, na wɔde wɔn a wɔyareɛ nyinaa, a nyarewa ne ɔhaw ahodoɔ akuta wɔn, wɔn a ahonhommɔne wɔ wɔn soɔ, wɔn a wɔyare ɛtwirɛ ne wɔn a wɔyare mmubuo brɛɛ no na ɔsaa wɔn yadeɛ.
Na nkurɔfoɔ akuakuo pii a wɔfiri Galilea ne Dekapoli ne Yerusalem ne Yuda ne Yordan agya dii n’akyi.
Na ɔhunuu nkurɔfoɔ akuakuo no, ɔkɔɔ bepɔ no so; na ɔtenaa aseɛ no, n’asuafoɔ baa ne nkyɛn.
Na ɔbuee n’ano kyerɛkyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Nhyira ne honhom mu ahiafoɔ, na wɔn na ɔsoro ahennie no yɛ wɔn dea.
Nhyira ne wɔn a wɔn werɛ ahoɔ, na wɔn na wɔbɛkyekyere wɔn werɛ.
Nhyira ne wɔn a wɔdwoɔ, na wɔn na wɔbɛnya asase no adi so.
Nhyira ne wɔn a tenenee ho kɔm ne sukɔm de wɔn, na wɔn na wɔbɛma wɔameeɛ.
Nhyira ne mmɔborɔhunufoɔ, na wɔn na wɔbɛhu wɔn mmɔbɔ.
Nhyira ne wɔn a wɔn akoma mu teɛ, na wɔn na wɔbɛhunu Onyankopɔn.
Nhyira ne apatafoɔ, na wɔn na wɔbɛfrɛ wɔn Nyankopɔn mma.
Nhyira ne wɔn a tenenee nti wɔtaa wɔn, na wɔn na ɔsoro ahennie no yɛ wɔn dea.
Nhyira ne mo sɛ wɔya mo, na wɔtaa mo, na me din nti wɔdi atorɔ ka asɛmmɔne nyinaa bi to mo soɔ.
Momma mo ani nnye, na mo ho nsɛpɛ mo, na mo akatua so wɔ soro; na saa ara na wɔtaa adiyifoɔ a wɔdii kan no.
Mone asase so nkyene. Na sɛ nkyene dɛ yera a, ɛdeɛn na wɔde bɛhyɛ no nkyene? Ɛnyɛ mma hwee bio, gye sɛ wɔhwie gu, na nnipa tiatia so.
Mone wiase hann. Kuro a ɛda bepɔ soɔ ntumi nhunta.
Na wɔnsɔ kanea mfa nhyɛ kodoɔ ase, na mmom wɔde si kaneadua so, na ahyerɛn ama wɔn a wɔwɔ ɛdan no mu nyinaa.
Ne saa nti, momma mo kanea nhyerɛn nnipa anim, na wɔahunu mo nneyɛɛ pa, na wɔahyɛ mo Agya a ɔwɔ soro no animuonyam.
Monnsusu sɛ mebaa sɛ merebɛsɛe mmara anaa adiyifoɔ no; mamma ammɛsɛe, na mmom mebɛhyɛɛ mu ma.
Na nokorɛ mese mo sɛ, ɔsoro ne asase nnya ntwaa mu yi, atwerɛdeɛ ketewa baako anaa nsensaneeɛ baako mpo remfiri mmara no mu ntwa mu, gye sɛ ne nyinaa aba mu ansa.

Enti obiara a ɔbɛto mmara mu nsɛm nketewa yi mu baako, na ɔbɛkyerɛkyerɛ nnipa saa no, wɔbɛfrɛ no ketewa wɔ ɔsoro ahennie mu; na obiara a ɔbɛdi soɔ, na ɔbɛkyerɛkyerɛ no, ɔno na wɔbɛfrɛ no kɛseɛ ɔsoro ahennie mu.
Na mese mo sɛ, sɛ mo tenenee ammoro Atwerɛfoɔ ne Farisifoɔ no deɛ so a, morennya ɔsoro ahennie mu nhyɛne.
Moate sɛ wɔsee tetefoɔ no sɛ: Nni awu; na obiara a ɔbɛdi awuo no bɛdi atemmuo mu fɔ.
Na me deɛ, mese mo sɛ, obiara a ne bo fu ne nua no bɛdi atemmuo mu fɔ; na obiara a ɔbɛse ne nua sɛ: Raka
no bɛdi fɔ mpanimfoɔ atitire no asɛnniiɛ. Na obiara a ɔbɛka sɛ: Ɔkwasea! no bɛdi fɔ akɔ ogya amanehunu kurom.
Enti sɛ wode w’ayɛyɛdeɛ ba afɔrebukyia ho, na ɛhɔ wokae sɛ wo nua wɔ asɛm tia wo a,
gya w’ayɛyɛdeɛ no afɔrebukyia no anim hɔ, na kɔ na wo ne wo nua no nkɔbom kane, ansa na woaba abɛma w’ayɛyɛdeɛ no.
Wo ne wo nkurobɔni wɔ kwan soɔ no, wo ne no mmom ntɛm; na da bi wo nkurobɔni no anyi wo anhyɛ ɔtemmufoɔ nsa, na ɔtemmufoɔ no anyi wo anhyɛ ɔsomfoɔ nsa, na wɔamfa wo ankɔto afiase.
Nokorɛ mese wo sɛ, woremfiri hɔ gye sɛ woatua kaprɛ a ɛbɛka akyire no ansa.
Moate sɛ wɔkaa sɛ: Nsɛe awadeɛ!
Na me deɛ, mese mo sɛ, obiara a ɔhwɛ ɔbaa na ne kɔn dɔ no no, na wafa no n’akomam dada.
Na sɛ w’ani nifa to wo suntidua a, tu, na to firi wo ho twene! Na ɛyɛ ma wo sɛ, wo ho akwaa mu baako bɛsɛeɛ, na wɔamfa wo nipadua nyinaa ankɔto amanehunu kurom.
Na sɛ wo nsa nifa to wo suntidua a, twa, na to firi wo ho twene; na ɛyɛ ma wo sɛ wo ho akwaa mu baako bɛsɛeɛ, na wɔamfa wo nipadua nyinaa ankɔto amanehunu kurom.
Wɔkaa nso sɛ: Obiara a ɔbɛgyae ne yere no mma no awaregyaeɛ krataa.
Na me deɛ, mese mo sɛ: Sɛ ɛnyɛ adwamammɔ nti na obi gyaa ne yere a, na wama ɔbaa no asɛe awadeɛ; na obiara a ɔbɛware deɛ wɔagyaa no no nso asɛe awadeɛ.
Bio, moate sɛ wɔsee tetefoɔ no sɛ: Nka ntanhunu, na fa wo ntankadeɛ ma Awurade.
Na me deɛ, mese mo sɛ: Monnka ntam koraa! Monnka ɔsoro, ɛfiri sɛ ɛyɛ Nyankopɔn ahennwa.
Monnka asase, ɛfiri sɛ ɛyɛ ne nan ntiasoɔ. Monnka Yerusalem, ɛfiri sɛ ɛyɛ ɔhenkɛseɛ kuro.
Nanso nka wo tiri ntam, ɛfiri sɛ worentumi nyɛ nwi baako fufuo anaa tuntum.
Na momma mo aane nyɛ aane, na dabi nyɛ dabi! Na deɛ ɛboro yei soɔ no firi bɔne mu.
Moate sɛ wɔkaa sɛ: Ani nsi ani ananmu, na ɛse nsi ɛse ananmu.
Na me deɛ, mese mo sɛ, mo ne ɔbɔnefoɔ no nnni asie, na deɛ ɔbɛpae w’aso nifa mu no, dane baako no nso ma no.
Na deɛ ɔpɛ sɛ ɔne wo di asɛm na ɔgye w’atadeɛ nhyɛaseɛ no, ma no mfa w’atadeɛ nkatasoɔ no nso.
Na obiara a ɔbɛhyɛ wo sɛ wone no nnante kwansini baako no, ɛne no nkɔ mmienu.
Deɛ ɔsrɛ woɔ no, ma no; na deɛ ɔpɛ sɛ ɔfɛm wo hɔ adeɛ no, nnane wo ho mfiri ne ho.
Moate sɛ wɔkaa sɛ: Dɔ wo yɔnko na tane wo tamfo.
Na me deɛ, mese mo sɛ monnɔ mo atamfoɔ, na mommɔ mpaeɛ mma wɔn a wɔtaa mo no;
na moayɛ mo Agya a ɔwɔ soro no mma; ɛfiri sɛ ɔma n’awia pue nnipa bɔne ne nnipa pa so, na ɔtɔ nsuo gu wɔn a wɔtene ne wɔn a wɔntene so.
Na sɛ modɔ wɔn a wɔdɔ mo a, akatua bɛn na monya? Togyefoɔ nso nyɛ saa anaa?
Na sɛ mokyea mo nuanom nko ara a, ɛdeɛn na na moayɛ aboro soɔ? Togyefoɔ nso nyɛ saa anaa?
Enti monyɛ pɛ, sɛdeɛ mo Agya a ɔwɔ soro yɛ pɛ no.
Monhwɛ yie na moanyɛ mo tenenee nnipa anim sɛ wɔbɛhu mo; anyɛ saa a, monni akatua wɔ mo Agya a ɔwɔ soro no nkyɛn.
Enti woreyɛ adɔeɛ a, nhyɛn totorobɛnto nni w’anim, sɛdeɛ nyaatwomfoɔ no yɛ no hyia adan mu ne aborɔno soɔ, sɛdeɛ wɔbɛnya nnipa anim animuonyam. Nokorɛ mese mo sɛ, wɔanya wɔn akatua dada.
Na wo deɛ, woreyɛ adɔeɛ a, mma wo benkum nnhunu deɛ wo nifa reyɛ no;
na w’adɔeɛ aka kokoam, na w’agya a ɔhunu kokoam no bɛtua wo ka.
Na sɛ morebɔ mpaeɛ a, monnyɛ sɛ nyaatwomfoɔ no; na wɔpɛ sɛ wɔgyina hyia adan mu, ne mmɔntene ntweaso bɔ mpaeɛ, na nnipa ahu wɔn. Nokorɛ mese mo sɛ, wɔanya wɔn akatua dada.
Na wo deɛ, worebɔ mpaeɛ a, hyɛne wo pia mu, na to wo pono mu na bɔ w’agya a ɔwɔ kokoam no mpaeɛ, na w’agya a ɔhunu kokoam no bɛtua wo ka.
Na sɛ morebɔ mpaeɛ a, monnkasakasa pii kwa sɛ abosonsomfoɔ; na wɔsusu sɛ wɔn kasa tentene nti wɔbɛtie wɔn!
Enti monnyɛ sɛ wɔn; na mo Agya nim nnoɔma a ɛhia mo ansa na moabisa no.
Enti mommɔ mpaeɛ sɛ:
Yɛn Agya a wowɔ soro,
Wo din ho nte,
W’ahennie mmra,
Deɛ wopɛ nyɛ wɔ
Asase so, sɛdeɛ ɛyɛ wɔ ɔsoro.
Ma yɛn yɛn daa aduane nnɛ,
Na fa yɛn aka kyɛ yɛn,
sɛdeɛ yɛde kyɛ wɔn a wɔde yɛn aka.
Na mfa yɛn nkɔ sɔhwɛ mu,
Na yi yɛn firi bɔne mu.
[Na wo na ahennie ne ahoɔden ne
animuonyam yɛ wo dea daa, Amen.]
Na sɛ mode nnipa mfomsoɔ kyɛ wɔn a, mo soro Agya de mo deɛ bɛkyɛ mo nso.
Na sɛ moamfa nnipa mfomsoɔ ankyɛ wɔn a, mo Agya no nso remfa mo mfomsoɔ nkyɛ mo.
Na sɛ moredi mmuada a, monnyɛ mo anim bosaa sɛ nyaatwomfoɔ no, na wɔnyinyane wɔn anim sɛdeɛ nnipa bɛhunu sɛ wɔredi mmuada. Nokorɛ mese mo sɛ, wɔanya wɔn akatua dada.
Na wo deɛ, woredi abuada a, sra wo tirim, na hohoro w’anim,
na nnipa anhunu sɛ woredi abuada, na mmom w’agya a ɔwɔ kokoam no; na w’agya a ɔhunu kokoam no bɛtua wo ka.
Monnhyehyɛ agyapadeɛ asase so, faako a nweweboaa ne nnaakyen sɛe no, na awifoɔ bubu kɔwia.
Na mmom monhyehyɛ agyapadeɛ ɔsoro, faako a nweweboaa ne nnaakyen nsɛe no, na awifoɔ mmubu nkɔwia;
na faako a w’agyapadeɛ wɔ no, ɛhɔ na w’akoma nso wɔ.
Nipadua kanea ne ani. Enti sɛ w’ani yɛ a, wo nipadua nyinaa bɛyɛ hann.
Na sɛ w’ani nyɛ a, wo nipadua nyinaa bɛyɛ kusuu. Na sɛ hann a ɛwɔ wo mu no yɛ sum a, esum no mu bɛyɛ duru yie.
Obiara ntumi nsom awuranom baanu. Sɛ ɛba saa a, ɔbɛtane baako na wadɔ baako, anaasɛ ɔde ne ho bɛbata baako no, na wabu baako animtia. Morentumi nsom Onyankopɔn ne mamon.
Yei nti mese mo sɛ: Monnnwennwene mo kra ho sɛ ɛdeɛn na mobɛdie, anaasɛ ɛdeɛn na mobɛnom, anaasɛ mo nipadua ho sɛ ɛdeɛn na mobɛfira. Ɔkra nsene aduane, na nipadua nsene ntoma anaa?
Monhwɛ wiem nnomaa sɛ wɔngu na wɔntwa na wɔmmoaboa ano ngu asan soɔ, nanso mo soro Agya yɛne wɔn; na monsom boɔ nsene wɔn anaa?
Mo mu hwan na ɔdwennwene a, ɔbɛtumi de da koro ato ne nkwa nna soɔ?
Na adɛn na modwendwene ntoma ho? Monhwɛ wiram sukooko, sɛdeɛ ɛnyini; ɛnyɛ adwuma, nso ɛnto asaawa,
nanso mese mo sɛ, Salomo animuonyam nyinaa mu no wanhyehyɛ ne ho sɛ yeinom mu baako.
Na sɛ Onyankopɔn fira wiram ahahan a ɛwɔ hɔ nnɛ na ɔkyena wɔde agu fononoo mu no ntoma saa a, ɔrenyɛ deɛ ɛkyɛne yei mma mo, mo a mo gyidie sua?
Enti monnnwennwene sɛ: Ɛdeɛn na yɛbɛdie, anaasɛ ɛdeɛn na yɛbɛnom, anaasɛ ɛdeɛn na yɛbɛfira?
Na yeinom nyinaa akyi na wiase amanaman no die. Na mo soro Agya nim sɛ yei nyinaa hia mo.
Na monhwehwɛ Nyankopɔn ahennie ne ne tenenee kane; na wɔde yeinom nyinaa bɛka mo ho.
Enti monnnwennwene ɔkyena ho; na ɔkyena no ara bɛdwendwene ne ho. Da biara mu bɔne dɔɔso ma ɛda no.

note.content: Na yi yɛn firi bɔne mu:
Na gye yɛn firi ɔbɔnefoɔ no nsam.
Tete atwerɛ a wɔgye tom afoforɔ binom mfa yei nka ho.

wj.content: Mommmu atɛn, na wɔammu mo atɛn.
Na atɛn ko a mobuo no, wɔde bɛbu mo; na ade korɔ a mode susuo no, wɔde bɛsusu ama mo.
Na adɛn na wohwɛ duaa a ɛwɔ wo nua ani soɔ, na wo ara w’ani so mpuna deɛ, wonhunu?
Anaasɛ ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na wobɛka akyerɛ wo nua sɛ: Ma menyi duaa no mfiri w’ani so, wɔ berɛ ko a mpuna wɔ w’ani soɔ?
Nyaatwomni! Yi mpuna no firi w’ani so kane, ɛno ansa na wobɛhunu adeɛ yie, ayi duaa no afiri wo nua ani soɔ.
Mommfa deɛ ɛyɛ kronkron mmma nkraman, na monnto mo nhwene pa nngu mprako anim, na wɔamfa wɔn nan antiatia so, na wɔansane ammɛsunsuane mo.
Mommisa, na wɔbɛma mo, monhwehwɛ, na mobɛhunu, mommom, na wɔbɛhini mo.
Na obiara a ɔbisa no, ɔnya, na deɛ ɔhwehwɛ no, ɔhunu, na deɛ ɔbɔ mu no, wɔhini no.
Anaasɛ mo mu nipa bɛn na ɔwɔ hɔ, na sɛ ne ba bisa no paanoo a, ɔbɛma no ɛboɔ?
Anaasɛ ɔbisa no apataa a, ɔbɛma no ɔwɔ?
Na sɛ mo a moyɛ abɔnefoɔ nim sɛdeɛ momma mo mma nnepa a, mprɛ ahe na mo Agya a ɔwɔ soro no remfa nnepa mma wɔn a wɔbisa no?
Enti adeɛ biara a mopɛ sɛ nnipa nyɛ mma mo no, mo nso monyɛ mma wɔn saa ara; na yei ne mmara ne adiyifoɔ no.
Monhyɛne ɔpono teateaa no mu; na ɔpono a ɛso ne ɔkwan a ɛtrɛ no ne deɛ ɛkɔ ɔsɛeɛ mu no, na wɔn a wɔhyɛne mu no dɔɔso.
Na ɔpono teateaa ne ɔkwan hihiaa no ne deɛ ɛkɔ nkwa mu, na wɔn a wɔhunu no sua.
Monhwɛ mo ho yie adiyifoɔ atorofoɔ ho, na wɔnam nnwanten nwoma mu ba mo nkyɛn, na wɔn mu deɛ, wɔyɛ mpataku adufudepɛfoɔ.
Wɔn aba na mode bɛhu wɔn. Wɔtete bobe wɔ nkasɛɛ so, anaasɛ wɔtete borɔdɔma wɔ hwerɛmo so?
Saa ara na dua pa biara so aba pa, na dua bɔne so aba bɔne.
Dua pa ntumi nso aba bɔne, na dua bɔne nso ntumi nso aba pa.
Dua biara a ɛnso aba pa no, wɔtwa, na wɔde gu gya mu.
Enti wɔn aba na mode bɛhu wɔn.
Ɛnyɛ obiara a ɔse me sɛ Awurade, Awurade no na ɔbɛkɔ ɔsoro ahennie mu, na mmom gye deɛ ɔyɛ m’agya a ɔwɔ soro no apɛdeɛ no.
Ɛda no, nnipa pii bɛka akyerɛ me sɛ: Awurade, Awurade, yɛmfaa wo din nhyɛɛ nkɔm, na yɛmfaa wo din ntuu ahonhommɔne, na yɛmfaa wo din nyɛɛ tumideɛ pii anaa?
Ɛno na mɛpaem maka makyerɛ wɔn sɛ: Mennim mo da, momfiri me so nkɔ, mo a moyɛ deɛ ɛntene!
Enti obiara a ɔte me nsɛm yi na ɔyɛ no, mede no bɛto ɔbadwemma a ɔtoo n’aban wɔ botan soɔ no ho.
Na osu kɛseɛ tɔe, na nsuo yirii, na mframa bɔe, na ɛbɛbɔɔ aban no, na anhwe ase; ɛfiri sɛ wɔtoo ne fapem ɔbotan so.
Na obiara a ɔte me nsɛm yi na ɔnyɛ no, wɔde no bɛto ɔba kwasea a ɔtoo n’aban anwea soɔ no ho.
Na osu kɛseɛ tɔe, na nsuo yirii, na mframa bɔe, na ɛbɛbɔɔ aban no, na ɛbui, na ɛbubuu pasapasa.

verse.content: Na ɛbaa sɛ Yesu wiee nsɛm yi ka no, ne nkyerɛkyerɛ no maa nkurɔfoɔ akuakuo no ho dwirii wɔn,
ɛfiri sɛ ɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ deɛ ɔwɔ tumi, na ɛnyɛ sɛ wɔn Atwerɛfoɔ no.
Na ɛberɛ a ɔfiri bepɔ no so sianeeɛ no, nkurɔfoɔ akuakuo pii dii n’akyi.
Na hwɛ, ɔkwatani bi ba bɛkotoo no kaa sɛ: Owura, sɛ wopɛ a, wobɛtumi ama me ho afi.
Na ɔtenee ne nsa kaa no kaa sɛ:

wj.content: Mepɛ, wo ho mfi!

verse.content: Na ntɛm ara na ne kwata no kɔeɛ.
Na Yesu see no sɛ:

wj.content: Hwɛ, nka nkyerɛ obiara, kɔ na fa wo ho kɔkyerɛ ɔsɔfoɔ, na kɔma ayɛyɛdeɛ a Mose hyɛeɛ no, na ɛnyɛ adanseɛ mma wɔn.

verse.content: Na Yesu kɔhyɛnee Kapernaum no, asraafoɔ ɔha so panin bi baa ne nkyɛn bɛsrɛɛ no
sɛ: Owura, m’akoa da fie yare mmubuo, na ɔrehunu ayayadeɛ dodo.
Na ɔsee no sɛ:

wj.content: Mɛba mabɛsa no yadeɛ.

verse.content: Na asraafoɔ ɔha so panin no buaa sɛ: Owura, mensɛ sɛ wobɛhyɛne me suhyɛ aseɛ, na ka asɛm nko, na m’akoa no ho bɛyɛ no den.
Na me nso meyɛ onipa a mehyɛ tumi aseɛ, na mewɔ asraafoɔ hyɛ m’ase, na mese oyi sɛ: Kɔ! a, ɔkɔ, na mese ɔfoforɔ bi sɛ: Bra! a, ɔba, na mese m’akoa sɛ: Yɛ yei! a, ɔyɛ.
Na Yesu teeɛ no, ɛyɛɛ no nwanwa, na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn a wɔdi n’akyire no sɛ:

wj.content: Nokorɛ mese mo sɛ, Israel mu mpo menhunuu gyidie kɛseɛ a ɛte sɛɛ pɛn.
Na mese mo sɛ, nnipa pii bɛfiri apueeɛ ne atɔeɛ aba, na wɔne Abraham ne Isak ne Yakob abɛtena adidiiɛ ɔsoro ahennie mu;
na ahennie mma no deɛ, wɔbɛto wɔn akɔgu akyirikyiri sum no mu; ɛhɔ na osu ne setwerɛ wɔ.

verse.content: Na Yesu see asraafoɔ ɔha so panin no sɛ:

wj.content: Kɔ, na sɛdeɛ woagye adie no, ɛnyɛ hɔ mma wo!

verse.content: Na ɛdɔn no ara mu, n’abɔfra no ho sanee no.
Na Yesu baa Petro fie no, ɔbɛhunuu n’asebaa sɛ ɔda hɔ yare yarefufuo.
Na ɔsɔɔ ne nsa, na yarefufuo no gyaa no, na ɔsɔre somm no.
Na ɛduruu anwummerɛ no, wɔde wɔn a wɔwɔ ahonhommɔne bebree brɛɛ no; na ɔde n’asɛm tuu ahonhommɔne no, na ɔsaa wɔn a wɔyare nyinaa yadeɛ.
Na deɛ Odiyifoɔ Yesaia kaeɛ no aba mu sɛ: Ɔno na ɔfaa yɛn ahoɔmmerɛ, na ɔsoaa yɛn nyarewa.
Na Yesu hunuu nkurɔfoɔ akuakuo pii wɔ ne ho no, ɔhyɛɛ sɛ wɔbɛkɔ asuogya nohoa.
Na Ɔtwerɛfoɔ bi ba bɛka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Ɔkyerɛkyerɛfoɔ, baabiara a wobɛkorɔ no, mɛdi w’akyi.
Na Yesu see no sɛ:

wj.content: Nsakraman wɔ abɔn, na ewiem nnomaa wɔ mpirebuo, nanso onipa ba no deɛ, ɔnni faako a ɔde ne tiri toɔ.

verse.content: Na asuafoɔ no mu ɔfoforɔ bi see no sɛ: Awurade, ma me kwan na menkɔsie m’agya ansa.
Na Yesu see no sɛ:

wj.content: Di m’akyi, na ma awufoɔ nsie wɔn awufoɔ!

verse.content: Na ɔtenaa kodoɔ mu no, n’asuafoɔ no dii n’akyi.
Na hwɛ, ahum kɛseɛ bi tuu ɛpo no so, na ɛmaa asorɔkyeɛ bu bɛkataa kodoɔ no so; na ɔno deɛ, na wada.
Na wɔbaa ne nkyɛn bɛnyanee no sɛ: Awurade, gye yɛn, na yɛreyera!
Na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Mo a mo gyidie sua, adɛn na ehu aka mo sɛɛ?

verse.content: Ɛnna ɔsɔre teateaa mframa ne ɛpo no, na ɛtaa dinn.
Na ɛyɛɛ nnipa no nwanwa, na wɔkaa sɛ: Onipa bɛn koraa ni na mframa ne ɛpo mpo tie no yi?
Na ɔduruu asuogya nohoa, Gadarenefoɔ asase soɔ no, nnipa baanu bi a honhommɔne wɔ wɔn soɔ firi aboda mu bɛhyiaa no; wɔyɛ awerɛmfoɔ sɛ, enti obiara ntumi ntwam ɔkwan no so.
Na hwɛ, wɔteateaa mu sɛ: Ɛdeɛn na yɛne wo wɔ yɛ, Nyankopɔn ba? Wobaa ha sɛ worebɛteetee yɛn ansa na ɛberɛ no aduru anaa?
Na mprakokuo bebree bi redidi akyirikyiri.
Na ahonhommɔne no srɛɛ no sɛ: Sɛ wotu yɛn a, ma yɛn kwan na yɛnkɔ mprakokuo yi mu.
Na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Monkɔ!

verse.content: Na wɔfirii adi kɔɔ mprako no mu, na hwɛ, mprakokuo no nyinaa bɔɔ kirididi sianee ɔbotan kuronkuron no kɔguu po no mu wuwuu nsuo no mu.
Na wɔn a wɔhwɛ wɔn soɔ no dwanedwanee, na wɔkɔɔ kuro no mu kɔkaa ne nyinaa ne wɔn a na ahonhommɔne wɔ wɔn soɔ no ho asɛm no.
Na hwɛ, kurom hɔfoɔ no nyinaa firii adi sɛ wɔrebɛhyia Yesu; na wɔhunuu no no, wɔsrɛɛ no sɛ ɔmfiri wɔn ahyeɛ so hɔ nkɔ.
Na ɔtenaa kodoɔ mu twa baa ɔno ara ne kurom.
Na hwɛ, wɔde onipa bi a ɔyare mmubuo a ɔda kɛtɛ so brɛɛ no. Na Yesu hunuu wɔn gyidie no, ɔka kyerɛɛ obubuani no sɛ:

wj.content: Ɔba, ma wo bo ntɔ wo yam; wɔde wo bɔne akyɛ wo.

verse.content: Na hwɛ, Atwerɛfoɔ no mu binom kaa wɔn mu sɛ: Onipa yi ka abususɛm.
Na Yesu hunuu wɔn adwene no, ɔkaa sɛ:

wj.content: Adɛn nti na modwene bɔne mo akoma mu?
Na deɛ ɛwɔ he na ɛyɛ mmerɛ, sɛ wɔbɛka sɛ: Wɔde wo bɔne akyɛ wo, anaasɛ wɔbɛka sɛ: Sɔre, na nante?
Na sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ na mobɛhunu sɛ Onipa Ba no wɔ tumi wɔ asase soɔ, sɛ ɔde bɔne kyɛ nti,

verse.content: ɔka kyerɛɛ obubuani no sɛ:

wj.content: Sɔre, fa wo kɛtɛ na kɔ wo fie!

verse.content: Na ɔsɔre sii mu kɔɔ ne fie.
Na nkurɔfoɔ akuakuo no hunuiɛ no, ɛyɛɛ wɔn nwanwa, na wɔhyɛɛ Onyankopɔn a ɔde saa tumi no ama nnipa no animuonyam.
Na Yesu firi hɔ retwam no, ɔhunuu onipa bi a ɔte atogyeeɛ a wɔfrɛ no Mateo; na ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ:

wj.content: Di m’akyi.

verse.content: Na ɔsɔre dii n’akyi.
Na ɛbaa sɛ ɔte adidiiɛ wɔ fie no, hwɛ, togyefoɔ ne nnebɔneyɛfoɔ pii ba bɛnee Yesu ne n’asuafoɔ no tenaa adidiiɛ.
Na Farisifoɔ no hunuiɛ no, wɔka kyerɛɛ n’asuafoɔ no sɛ: Adɛn nti na mo kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ ne togyefoɔ ne nnebɔneyɛfoɔ didie yi?
Na ɔteeɛ no, ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Wɔn a wɔn ho yɛ den no, ɛnhia wɔn ɔyaresafoɔ na mmom wɔn a wɔyareɛ no.
Na monkɔ nkɔsua yei ase: Mepɛ mmɔborɔhunu na ɛnyɛ afɔrebɔ. Mammɛfrɛ ateneneefoɔ, na mebɛfrɛɛ nnebɔneyɛfoɔ.

verse.content: Ɛnna Yohane asuafoɔ no baa ne nkyɛn bɛkaa sɛ: Adɛn nti na yɛne Farisifoɔ di mmuada, na w’asuafoɔ deɛ, wɔnni mmuada yi?
Na Yesu buaa wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Ayeforɔkunu ne ayeforɔ asefoɔ no wɔ hɔ yi, ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na wɔn werɛ aho? Na nna bi bɛba a wɔbɛyi ayeforɔkunu no afiri wɔn nkyɛn, na ɛno ansa na wɔbɛdi mmuada.
Obi mfa ntoma foforɔ sini ntɛ atadeɛ dada mu; ɛfiri sɛ ntɛmu no yi firi atadeɛ no mu a, nteteeɛ no yɛ kɛseɛ.

Nanso wɔmfa nsa foforɔ ngu aboa nwoma nkotokuo dada mu; anyɛ saa a, nkotokuo no bɛpaepae, na nsa no ahwie agu, na nkotokuo no asɛe. Na wɔde nsa foforɔ gu nkotokuo foforɔ mu, na ne mmienu nyinaa ayɛ yie.

verse.content: Ɔreka yeinom akyerɛ wɔn no, hwɛ, ɔpanin baako bi ba bɛkotoo no kaa sɛ: Seesei ara me babaa awu, na bra, na fa wo nsa bɛto ne so, na ɔbɛnya nkwa.
Na Yesu sɔre ne n’asuafoɔ no dii n’akyi.
Na hwɛ, ɔbaa bi a mogya atu no mfirinhyia dummienu faa n’akyi de ne nsa bɛkaa n’atadeɛ ano nnwo.
Na ɔkaa no ne tirim sɛ: Sɛ mede me nsa meka n’atadeɛ nko ara a, me ho bɛyɛ me den.
Na Yesu danee ne ho na ɔhunuu no no, ɔkaa sɛ:

wj.content: Ɔbabaa, ma wo bo ntɔ wo yam, wo gyidie agye wo.

verse.content: Na ɛfiri dɔn no ara mu no na ɔbaa no ho yɛɛ no den.
Na Yesu duruu ɔpanin no fie na ɔhunuu atɛntɛbɛnhyɛnfoɔ ne nkurɔfokuo a wɔreyɛ gyegyeegye no,
ɔkaa sɛ:

wj.content: Momma kwan, na ababaa no nwui, na wada.

verse.content: Na wɔseree no.
Na ɔpamm nkurɔfokuo no firii adie no, ɔkɔɔ mu kɔsɔɔ ne nsa, na ababaa no nyanee.
Na yei ho asɛm trɛɛ asase no nyinaa so.
Na Yesu firi hɔ rekorɔ no, anifirafoɔ baanu dii n’akyi teateaa mu sɛ: Dawid ba, hu yɛn mmɔbɔ!
Na ɔduruu fie no, anifirafoɔ no baa ne nkyɛn; na Yesu bisaa wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Mogye di sɛ mɛtumi mayɛ yei?

verse.content: Wɔbuaa no sɛ: Aane, owura.
Ɛnna ɔde ne nsa kaa wɔn ani kaa sɛ:

wj.content: Sɛdeɛ mo gyidie teɛ no, ɛnyɛ saa ara mma mo!

verse.content: Na wɔn ani buebueeɛ. Na Yesu hyɛɛ wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Monhwɛ na obiara ante!

verse.content: Na wɔn deɛ, wɔfirii hɔ no, wɔde ne ho asɛm tenee asase no nyinaa so.
Na wɔrefiri adie no, hwɛ, wɔde emum bi a honhommɔne wɔ ne soɔ brɛɛ no.
Na ɔtuu honhommɔne no no, emum no kasae. Na ɛyɛɛ nkurɔfoɔ akuakuo no nwanwa, na wɔkaa sɛ: Wɔnhunuu saa bi da wɔ Israel.
Na Farisifoɔ no deɛ, wɔkaa sɛ: Ɔnam ahonhommɔne panin so na ɔtu ahonhommɔne.
Na Yesu kyinii nkuro ne nkuraa nyinaa mu kyerɛkyerɛɛ wɔn hyia adan mu, na ɔkaa ahennie no ho asɛmpa, na ɔsaa nyarewa ne ahoɔmmerɛ nyinaa.
Na ɔhunuu nkurɔfoɔ akuakuo no, wɔyɛɛ no mmɔbɔ, ɛfiri sɛ na wɔabrɛ, na na wɔsam hɔ sɛ nnwan a wɔnni hwɛfoɔ.
Ɛnna ɔka kyerɛɛ n’asuafoɔ no sɛ:

wj.content: Otwa adwuma no dɔɔso, na adwumayɛfoɔ no deɛ, wɔsua.
Enti monsrɛ otwa wura no, na ɔmma adwumayɛfoɔ mmra ne twa adwuma no mu!

verse.content: Na ɔfrɛɛ n’asuafoɔ dummienu no bae, na ɔmaa wɔn ahonhom fi so tumi sɛ wɔntu wɔn, na wɔnsa nyarewa ne ahoɔmmerɛ nyinaa.
Na asomafoɔ dummienu no din nie: Deɛ ɔdi kan ne Simon a wɔfrɛ no Petro ne ne nua Andrea; Yakobo a ɔyɛ Sebedeo ba no ne ne nua Yohane,
Filipo ne Bartolomeo, Toma ne togyeni Mateo no, Alfeo ba Yakobo ne Tadeo,
Simon a ɔfiri Kana ne Yuda Iskariot a ɔyii no maeɛ no nso.
Dummienu yi na Yesu somaa wɔn hyɛɛ wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Mommmane nnkɔ amanaman kwan so, na monnhyɛne Samariafoɔ kuro biara mu,
na mmom monkɔ Israel fie nnwan a wɔayera no nkyɛn!
Na mokɔ a, monkɔka sɛ: Ɔsoro ahennie no abɛn.
Monsa ayarefoɔ yadeɛ, monnyane awufoɔ, momma akwatafoɔ ho mfi, montu ahonhommɔne; moanya no kwa, na momfa mma kwa!
Monnhwehwɛ sika anaa dwetɛ anaa kɔbere nngu mo abɔsoɔ mu,
monnhwehwɛ akwantuo bɔtɔ anaa ntadeɛ mmienu anaa mpaboa anaa poma; na ɛfata odwumayɛfoɔ sɛ ɔdidiiɛ.
Na kuro anaa akuraa biara a mobɛhyɛne mu no, mommisa deɛ ɔfata wɔ hɔ, na ɛhɔ na montena nkɔsi sɛ mobɛfiri hɔ akorɔ.
Na mohyɛne efie bi mu a, monkyea emufoɔ no.
Na sɛ ɛfata efie no a, mo asomdwoeɛ mmra so; na sɛ ɛmfata no a, mo asomdwoeɛ nsane mmra mo nkyɛn.
Na obiara a ɔrennye mo na ɔrentie mo nsɛm no, mofiri efie anaa kuro no mu rekɔ a, momporoporo mo nan ase mfuturo.
Nokorɛ mese mo sɛ, atemmuo da no, ɛbɛfanyinam Sodom ne Gomora asase no asene saa kuro no.
Hwɛ, meresoma mo sɛ nnwan akɔ mpataku mfimfini; enti monyɛ aniteɛ sɛ awɔ, na monyɛ bɔkɔɔ sɛ mmuruburo.
Na monhwɛ mo ho yie nnipa ho; na wɔbɛyi mo ama mpanimfoɔ adwa, na wɔaka mo mpire wɔn hyia adan mu.
Na me nti wɔde mo bɛkɔ amradofoɔ ne ahemfo anim na adi adanseɛ akyerɛ wɔn ne amanaman.
Na sɛ wɔyi mo ma a, monnnwennwene sɛdeɛ mobɛkasa anaa deɛ mobɛka, na wɔde deɛ mobɛka no bɛma mo ɛdɔn no ara mu.
Na ɛnyɛ mo na mokasa, na mmom mo Agya Honhom no na ɔkasa mo mu.
Na onua bɛyi onua ama owuo, na agya ayi ɔba ama, na mma asɔre atia awofoɔ, na wɔama wɔakum wɔn.
Na me din nti, nnipa nyinaa bɛtane mo; na deɛ ɔbɛgyina ano akɔduru awieeɛ no, ɔno na wɔbɛgye no nkwa.
Na sɛ wɔtaa mo kuro yi mu a, monnwane nkɔ foforɔ mu; na nokorɛ mese mo sɛ, morenwie Israel nkuro nyinaa mu ansa na Onipa Ba no aba.
Osuani nsene ne kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ, na akoa nsene ne wura.
Ɛdɔɔso ma osuani sɛ ɔbɛyɛ sɛ ne kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ ne akoa sɛ ɔbɛyɛ sɛ ne wura; na sɛ wɔafrɛ efie wura no Beelsebul a, mprɛ ahe na wɔremfa mfrɛ ne fiefoɔ?
Enti monnsuro wɔn; na biribiara nni hɔ a ɛso akata a ɛrenna adie, anaa ahunta a wɔrenhunu.
Deɛ meka mekyerɛ mo esum mu no, monka no hann mu, na deɛ mote no mo aso mu no, mompae mu nka no adan atifi.
Na monnsuro wɔn a wɔkum honam na wɔntumi nkum ɔkra, na mmom monsuro deɛ ɔbɛtumi asɛe ɔkra ne honam amanehunu kuro mu.
Wɔntɔn mpatuprɛ mmienu nnye kaprɛ? Nanso wɔn mu baako mpo nkwati mo Agya nhwe fam.
Na mo tirinwi mpo, wɔakan ne nyinaa.
Enti monnsuro! Mosene mpatuprɛ bebree.
Enti obiara a ɔbɛbɔ me din nnipa anim no, me nso mɛbɔ ne din m’agya a ɔwɔ soro no anim;
na obiara a ɔbɛpa me wɔ nnipa anim no, me nso mɛpa no m’agya a ɔwɔ soro no anim.
Monnsusu sɛ mede asomdwoeɛ baa asase so; ɛnyɛ asomdwoeɛ na mede baeɛ, na mmom nkrantɛ.
Na meba mebɛpaepaee mu na ɔbarima asɔre atia n’agya,
na ɔbabaa asɔre atia ne na,
na aseɛ asɔre atia n’asebaa;
na onipa fiefoɔ bɛyɛ n’atamfo.
Deɛ ɔpɛ agya anaa ɛna kyɛne me no, ɔmfata me; na deɛ ɔpɛ ɔbabarima anaa ɔbabaa kyɛne me no, ɔmfata me,
na deɛ ɔmfa n’asɛnnua na ɔnni m’akyire no, ɔmfata me.
Deɛ ne nsa aka ne kra no, ɛbɛfiri ne nsa, na deɛ me nti ne kra firi ne nsa no, ne nsa bɛka.
Deɛ ɔgye mo no gye me, na deɛ ɔgye me no gye deɛ ɔsomaa me no.
Deɛ ɔgye odiyifoɔ wɔ odiyifoɔ din mu no, ne nsa bɛka odiyifoɔ akatua; na deɛ ɔgye onipa tenenee wɔ onipa tenenee din mu no, ne nsa bɛka onipa tenenee akatua.
Na obiara a ɔbɛma nketewa yi mu baako nsuonwunu kuruwa ma osuani din mu no, nokorɛ mese mo sɛ, n’akatua remmɔ no.

verse.content: Na ɛbaa sɛ Yesu wiee n’asuafoɔ dummienu no kasakyerɛ no, ɔfirii hɔ sɛ ɔrekɔkyerɛkyerɛ na waka asɛm wɔn nkuro mu.
Na Yohane tee Kristo nnwuma wɔ afiase no, ɔsomaa n’asuafoɔ
kɔbisaa no sɛ: Wone deɛ ɔreba no, anaasɛ yɛnhwɛ ɔfoforɔ kwan?
Na Yesu bua see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Monkɔ, na monkɔka deɛ moteɛ na mohunu yi nkyerɛ Yohane:
Anifirafoɔ hunu adeɛ, na mmubuafoɔ nante, akwatafoɔ ho fi, na asotifoɔ te asɛm, awufoɔ nyane, na wɔka asɛmpa kyerɛ ahiafoɔ.
Na nhyira ne deɛ merento no suntidua.

verse.content: Na yeinom rekorɔ no, Yesu firii aseɛ kaa Yohane ho asɛm kyerɛɛ nkurɔfoɔ akuakuo no sɛ:

wj.content: Ɛdeɛn na mofirii adi kɔɔ serɛ so kɔhwɛeɛ? Mmɛwa a mframa rehim anaa?
Anaasɛ ɛdeɛn na mofirii adi kɔhwɛeɛ? Onipa a ɔhyɛ ntadeɛ bɔkɔɔ anaa? Hwɛ, wɔn a wɔhyɛ ntadeɛ bɔkɔɔ no wɔ ahemfo afie mu.
Anaasɛ adɛn nti na mofirii adie? Mokɔhwɛɛ odiyifoɔ anaa? Aane, mese mo sɛ, ɔsene odiyifoɔ mpo.
Oyi ne deɛ wɔatwerɛ ne ho asɛm sɛ:
Hwɛ, meresoma me bɔfoɔ adi w’anim
a ɔbɛsiesie w’anim kwan.
Nokorɛ mese mo sɛ, wɔn a mmaa awo wɔn nyinaa mu biara nsɔree a ɔsene Yohane suboni; nanso deɛ ɔyɛ ketewa koraa wɔ ɔsoro ahennie mu no yɛ kɛseɛ sene no.
Na ɛfiri Osuboni Yohane berɛ so bɛsi nnɛ wɔyɛ ɔsoro ahennie no ho adeɛ anibereɛ so, na wɔn a wɔn ani abereɛ no fa no aniɛden so.
Na adiyifoɔ no nyinaa ne mmara no hyɛɛ nkɔm bɛsii Yohane so.
Na sɛ mopɛ sɛ mogye a, oyi ne Elia a ɔreba no.
Deɛ ɔwɔ aso no, ma no ntie!
Na hwan ho na mede nnɛ mma yi bɛtoɔ? Wɔte sɛ mmɔfra a wɔtete edwa ase refrɛfrɛ wɔn mfɛfoɔ sɛ:
Yɛahyɛne atɛntɛbɛn ama mo na moansa;
yɛatwa agyaadwo ama mo, na mo werɛ anho.
Na Yohane baeɛ, ɔnnidi na ɔnnom, na wɔse: Ɔwɔ honhommɔne.
Onipa ba no baeɛ, ɔdidi na ɔnom, na wɔse: Hwɛ, odidifoɔ ne ɔsanomfoɔ, togyefoɔ ne nnebɔneyɛfoɔ adamfo. Nanso, nyansa nam ne nnwuma so di bem.

verse.content: Ɛnna ɔfirii aseɛ kaa nkuro a na wayɛ ne tumideɛ pii wom no anim sɛ wɔansakyera wɔn adwene no sɛ:

wj.content: Korasin, due! Betsaida, due! Ɛfiri sɛ tumideɛ a wɔayɛ no mo mu yi, sɛ wɔyɛɛ no Tiro ne Sidon a, anka wɔasakyera wɔn adwene ayitoma ne nso mu dada.
Nso mese mo sɛ, atemmuda no, ɛbɛfanyinam Tiro ne Sidon asene mo.
Na wo Kapernaum,
wɔbɛma wo so akɔ soro anaa?
Hwɛ, wɔbɛbrɛ wo ase akɔ Asamando;
ɛfiri sɛ tumideɛ a wɔayɛ no wo mu yi, sɛ wɔyɛɛ no Sodom a, anka ɛwɔ hɔ de bɛsi nnɛ.
Nso mese mo sɛ, atemmuda no, ɛbɛfanyinam Sodom asase asene wo.

verse.content: Saa berɛ no ara mu Yesu kaa sɛ:

wj.content: Agya, ɔsoro ne asase wura, meyi wo ayɛ sɛ wode nnoɔma yi ahunta anyansafoɔ ne animdefoɔ, na woayi akyerɛ nkɔkoaa.
Aane, Agya, saa na ɛyɛ anisɔ w’anim.
M’agya de nnoɔma nyinaa ahyɛ me nsa; na obiara nnim Ɔba no, gye Agya no, na obiara nnim Agya no, gye Ɔba no ne deɛ Ɔba no pɛ sɛ ɔyi no adi kyerɛ no.
Mo a moayɛ adwuma abrɛ na wɔasoa mo nnesoa nyinaa, mommra me nkyɛn, na mɛma mo ahome.
Momfa me kɔnnua nto mo ho so, na monsua me, ɛfiri sɛ medwo na mebrɛ me ho ase akoma mu; na mobɛnya ɔhome ama mo kra.
Na me kɔnnua yɛ mmerɛ, na m’adesoa yɛ hare.

verse.content: Ɛberɛ no mu no, Yesu kɔfaa aburoofuo bi mu homeda bi; na ɛkɔm dee n’asuafoɔ no, na wɔfitii aseɛ pempanee mmɛtem no bi weeɛ.
Na Farisifoɔ no hunuiɛ no, wɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Hwɛ, w’asuafoɔ yɛ deɛ ɛnni ho kwan sɛ wɔyɛ no homeda.
Na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Monkenkann deɛ Dawid yɛeɛ, berɛ a ɛkɔm dee no ne wɔn a wɔka ne ho no?
Sɛdeɛ ɔkɔɔ Nyankopɔn fie, na ɔkɔdii Kyerɛ paanoo a, ɔne wɔn a wɔka ne ho no nni ho kwan sɛ wɔdie, gye asɔfoɔ nko ara no?
Anaasɛ monkenkann mmara no mu, sɛdeɛ homeda, asɔfoɔ a wɔwɔ asɔrefie no sɛe homeda nanso wɔnni ho fɔ no?
Na mese mo sɛ, deɛ ɔkyɛne asɔrefie no wɔ ha.
Na sɛ anka mote yei aseɛ, sɛ: Mmɔborɔhunu na mepɛ na ɛnyɛ afɔrebɔ a, anka moammu wɔn a wɔnni fɔ no fɔ.
Na Onipa Ba no yɛ homeda no wura.

verse.content: Na ɔfiri hɔ kɔɔ wɔn hyiadan mu.
Na hwɛ, na onipa bi wɔ hɔ a ne nsa awuo. Na wɔbisaa no sɛ: Ɛwɔ ho kwan sɛ wɔsa yadeɛ homeda anaa? Na wɔakɔtoto n’ano.
Na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Mo mu hwan na sɛ ɔwɔ odwan baako na ɔkɔtɔ amena mu homeda a, ɔrensɔ ne mu mma no soɔ?
Onipa nsom bo nsene odwan anaa? Enti ɛwɔ ho kwan sɛ wɔyɛ papa homeda.

verse.content: Ɛnna ɔka kyerɛɛ onipa no sɛ:

wj.content: Tene wo nsa!

verse.content: Na ɔteneeɛ, na ɛsane yɛɛ yie sɛ baako no.
Na Farisifoɔ no firi adi kɔtuu ne ho agyina sɛdeɛ wɔbɛkum no.
Na Yesu hunuiɛ no, ɔtwee ne ho firii hɔ, na nkurɔfoɔ akuakuo pii dii n’akyi, na ɔsaa wɔn nyinaa yadeɛ.
Na ɔbaraa wɔn sɛ wɔnnyi no adi,
na deɛ Odiyifoɔ Yesaia kaeɛ no aba mu sɛ:

block_quote.content: Hwɛ, m’abɔfra a mayi no,
deɛ medɔ no a me kra ani sɔ no;
Mede me Honhom bɛgu ne so,
na waka atɛntenenee akyerɛ Amanaman mufoɔ.
Ɔrenko, na ɔrenteateam,
na obi rente ne nne abɔntene so;
mmɛwa a abuka no, ɔremmu mu,
na ntomaban a ɛfiri wisie nso, ɔrennum
de akɔsi sɛ ɔde atɛntenenee bɛkɔ nkonimdie mu.
Na ne din so na amanaman de wɔn ho bɛtoɔ.

verse.content: Ɛnna wɔde obi a ɔwɔ honhommɔne a ɔyɛ onifirani ne emum brɛɛ no, na ɔsaa no yadeɛ maa emum no kasae, na ɔhunuu adeɛ.
Na nkurɔfoɔ akuakuo no nyinaa ho dwirii wɔn, na wɔkaa sɛ: Ɛnyɛ Dawid ba no nie?
Na Farisifoɔ no teeɛ no, wɔkaa sɛ: Ahonhommɔne panin Beelsebul nko ara so na onipa yi nam tu ahonhommɔne.
Na ɔhunuu wɔn adwene no, ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Ahennie biara a ɛne ne ho di mpaepaemu no dane amamfo; na kuro anaa efie biara a ɛne ne ho di mpaepaemu no rennyina.
Na sɛ Satan tu Satan a, na ɔne ne ho adi mpaepaemu; na ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na n’ahennie agyina?
Na sɛ me, mede Beelsebul na metu ahonhommɔne a, na mo mma de hwan na ɛtu wɔn? Yei nti wɔbɛyɛ mo atemmufoɔ.
Na sɛ mede Nyankopɔn Honhom na metu ahonhommɔne a, ɛnneɛ na Nyankopɔn ahennie anya aba mo so.
Anaasɛ ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na obi bɛtumi akɔ ɔhoɔdenfoɔ fie akɔfom n’afideɛ, gye sɛ ɔdi kan kyekyere ɔhoɔdenfoɔ no ansa na wafom ne fie.
Deɛ ɔnka me ho no, na ɔtia me; na deɛ ɔne me mmoaboa ano no, na ɔhwete mu.
Yei nti mese mo sɛ: Wɔde bɔne ne abususɛm nyinaa bɛkyɛ nnipa, na honhom ho abususɛm deɛ, wɔremfa nkyɛ nnipa.
Na deɛ ɔbɛkasa atia Onipa Ba no, wɔde bɛkyɛ no; na deɛ ɔbɛkasa atia Honhom Kronkron deɛ, wɔremfa nkyɛ no wiase ha ne wiase a ɛreba no mu.
Momma dua no nyɛ dua pa, na n’aba ayɛ aba pa; anaasɛ momma dua no nyɛ dua bɔne, na n’aba ayɛ aba bɔne; na dua no aba na wɔde hunu dua korɔ.
Nhuritia mma! Moyɛ abɔnefoɔ yi, mobɛyɛ dɛn atumi aka nsɛm pa? Na deɛ ayɛ akoma ma abu soɔ no, na ano ka.
Onipa pa firi nnepa a waboaboa ano n’akoma mu no mu na ɔyi nnepa adie; na onipa bɔne firi nnebɔne a waboaboa ano n’akoma mu no mu na ɔyi nnebɔne adie.
Na mese mo sɛ, asɛnhunu biara a nnipa bɛka no, wɔbɛbu ho akonta atemmuda.
Na wo nsɛm so na wɔnam bɛbu wo bem, na wo nsɛm so nso na wɔnam bɛbu wo fɔ.

verse.content: Ɛnna Atwerɛfoɔ ne Farisifoɔ no mu bi ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ, yɛpɛ sɛ yɛhunu nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ bi firi wo hɔ.
Na ɔbua see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Nnɛ mma abɔnefoɔ ne awaresɛefoɔ hwehwɛ nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ, nanso wɔremma wɔn nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ biara gye Odiyifoɔ Yona nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ no.
Na sɛdeɛ Yona dii bonsu yam nnansa awia ne anadwo no, saa ara nso na Onipa Ba no bɛdi asase ase nnansa awia ne anadwo.
Ninewe mmarima ne nnɛ mma yi bɛsɔre atemmuo no mu na wɔabu wɔn fɔ, ɛfiri sɛ wɔsakyeraa wɔn adwene wɔ Yona asɛnka mu; na hwɛ, deɛ ɔsene Yona wɔ ha.
Anafoɔ fam hemmaa no ne nnɛ mma yi bɛsɔre atemmuo no mu, na wɔabu wɔn fɔ, ɛfiri sɛ ɔfiri asase ano nohoa bɛtiee Salomo nyansa; na hwɛ, deɛ ɔsene Salomo wɔ ha.
Sɛ honhom fi no firi onipa no mu a, ɔkɔkyinkyini akwaweɛ so hwehwɛ ɔhome, na ɔnnya bi.
Ɛnna ɔse: Mɛsane makɔ me dan a mefiri mu mebaeɛ no mu. Na ɔba a, ɔbɛto sɛ ɛda mpan, wɔaprapra mu, na wasiesie mu.
Ɛnna ɔkɔ na ɔkɔfa ahonhom nson foforɔ a wɔyɛ bɔne sene no ka ne ho, na wɔbɛhyɛne mu tena hɔ; na onipa no akyire yi asetena yɛ bɔne sene kane deɛ no. Saa ara nso na ɛbɛyɛ nnɛ mma abɔnefoɔ yi.

verse.content: Na ɔgu so rekasa kyerɛ nkurɔfoɔ akuakuo no, hwɛ, ne na ne ne nuanom bɛgyinaa afikyire pɛɛ sɛ wɔne no kasa.
Na obi ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Hwɛ, wo na ne wo nuanom gyina afikyire pɛ sɛ wɔne wo kasa.
Na ɔbua see deɛ ɔsee no saa no sɛ:

wj.content: Hwan ne me na, na hwan ne me nuanom?

verse.content: Na ɔtenee ne nsa kyerɛɛ n’asuafoɔ no so kaa sɛ:

wj.content: Hwɛ, me na ne me nuanom ni!
Na obiara a ɔbɛyɛ m’agya a ɔwɔ soro no apɛdeɛ no, ɔno ara ne me nuabarima ne onuabaa ne ɛna.

verse.content: Ɛda no ara Yesu firii fie kɔtenaa mpoano.
Na nkurɔfoɔ akuakuo pii boaboaa wɔn ho ano baa ne nkyɛn, ɛno nti ɔkɔɔ kodoɔ mu kɔtenaa mu; na nkurɔfokuo no nyinaa gyinagyina mpoano.
Na ɔkasaa pii mmebuo mu kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Hwɛ, ogufoɔ bi firii adi kɔguu aba.
Na ɔreguo no, ebi kɔguu kwankyɛn, na nnomaa ba bɛsosɔe.
Ebi nso kɔguu aboɔ so, faako a dɔteɛ pii nnie; na ntɛm ara na ɛfifiriiɛ, ɛfiri sɛ na dɔteɛ no mu nnɔ,
na owia firiiɛ no, ɛkusae, na ɛsiane sɛ ɛnni nhini nti, ɛhyeeɛ.
Ebi nso kɔguu nkasɛɛ mu; na ɛrefifire no, ɛmiaa no.
Na ebi nso kɔguu asase pa mu; na ɛsoo aba, ebi ɔha, ebi aduosia, ebi aduasa.
Deɛ ɔwɔ aso no, ma no ntie!

verse.content: Na asuafoɔ no baa ne nkyɛn bɛbisaa no sɛ: Adɛn na wokasa kyerɛ wɔn mmebuo mu?
Na ɔbua see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Mo deɛ, wɔde ama mo sɛ monhunu ɔsoro ahennie mu ahuntasɛm no, na wɔn deɛ, wɔmfa mmaa wɔn.
Na obiara a ɔwɔ no, wɔbɛma no, na wanya aboro so; na obiara a ɔnnie no, deɛ ɔwɔ mpo wɔbɛgye afiri ne nsam.
Yei nti na mekasa mekyerɛ wɔn mmebuo mu, ɛfiri sɛ wɔhunu deɛ, nanso wɔnhunu, na wɔte deɛ, nso wɔnte aseɛ.
Na wɔn mu na Yesaia adiyisɛm no aba mu sɛ:
Teɛ deɛ, mobɛte, na morente aseɛ;
na hunu nso mobɛhunu, na morenhunu mu.
Ɛfiri sɛ ɔman yi akoma apirim,
na wɔn aso mu ayɛ duru,
na wɔakatakata wɔn ani
na wɔamfa wɔn ani anhunu,
na wɔamfa wɔn aso ante,
na wɔamfa wɔn akoma ante aseɛ,
na wɔannane wɔn ho, na mansa wɔn yadeɛ.
Na mo deɛ, nhyira ne mo ani sɛ ɛhunu, ne mo aso sɛ ɛteɛ.
Na nokorɛ mese mo sɛ, adiyifoɔ ne ateneneefoɔ pii pɛɛ sɛ anka wɔhunu deɛ mohunu yi, na wɔte deɛ moteɛ yi, nanso wɔanhunu, na wɔante nso.
Afei montie ogufoɔ ho bɛ no:
Obiara a ɔte ahennie no ho asɛm, na ɔnte aseɛ no, ɔbɔnefoɔ no ba bɛhwim deɛ wɔagu no n’akoma mu no; oyi ne deɛ wɔguu no kwankyɛn no.
Na deɛ wɔguu no aboɔ soɔ no, ɔno ne deɛ ɔte asɛm no, na ɔde anigyeɛ gye no ntɛmntɛm;
nanso ɔnni nhini wɔ ne mu, na ɔtena hɔ kakra, na sɛ asɛm no nti amanehunu anaa ɔtaa ba a, ntɛm ara na ato no suntidua.
Na deɛ wɔguu no nkasɛɛ mu no ne deɛ ɔte asɛm no, na wiase asetena yi mu dadwene ne haw ne ahonyadeɛ nnaadaa mia asɛm no, na ɛnso aba.
Na deɛ wɔguu no asase pa mu no ne deɛ ɔte asɛm no, na ɔte aseɛ; ɔno na ɔso aba, ebi so ɔha, ebi aduosia, ebi aduasa.
Ɔbuu wɔn bɛ foforɔ bi sɛ: Ɔsoro ahennie no te sɛ onipa bi a ɔguu aba pa n’afuo mu.
Na ɛberɛ a na obiara ada no, ɔtamfo bi ba bɛguu wura bɔne bi ayuo no mu, na ɔfirii hɔ kɔeɛ.
Na ɛyii ahahan na ɛsoo aba no, na wura bɔne no nso daa adie.
Na afuowura no nkoa baa ne nkyɛn bɛbisaa no sɛ: Owura, ɛnyɛ aba pa na woguu no w’afuo no mu? Na wura bɔne yi deɛ, ɛfiri he?
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: Ɔtamfoɔ bi na wayɛ saa. Na nkoa no bisaa no sɛ: Ɛnneɛ wopɛ sɛ yɛkɔ kɔboaboa ano anaa?
Ɛnna ɔse: Dabi, anhwɛ a, moreboaboa wura bɔne ano no, na moatu ayuo no bi afra mu.

Momma ne mmienu no nyinaa nyini nkɔsi twa berɛ, na twa berɛ no mu mɛka makyerɛ twafoɔ no sɛ: Mommoaboa wura bɔne no ano kane, na monkyekyere no afiafi mma wɔnkɔhye, na ayuo no deɛ mommoaboa ano nkɔgu me san so!

verse.content: Ɔbuu wɔn bɛ foforɔ sɛ:

wj.content: Ɔsoro ahennie te sɛ sinapi
fua a onipa bi fa kɔduaa n’afuo mu.
Ɛno na ɛyɛ aba ahodoɔ nyinaa mu ketewa deɛ, nanso ɛnyini a, ɛne ɛfan nyinaa mu kɛseɛ, na ɛyɛ dua ma ewiem nnomaa ba bɛyɛ pirebuo wɔ ne mman so.

verse.content: Ɔbuu wɔn bɛ foforɔ sɛ:

wj.content: Ɔsoro ahennie te sɛ mmɔka a ɔbaa bi fa kɔfraa esiam korokuma mmiɛnsa ma mu de kɔsii sɛ ne nyinaa kaeɛ.

verse.content: Yeinom nyinaa Yesu ka kyerɛɛ nkurɔfoɔ akuakuo no abebuo mu, na wankwati bɛ anka asɛm biara ankyerɛ wɔn.
Yei ma deɛ odiyifoɔ
no kaeɛ no ba mu sɛ:

block_quote.content: Mɛbue m’ano mmebuo mu,
na mɛpae nsɛm a ahunta firi wiase asefire no mu maka.

verse.content: Afei ɔgyaa nkurɔfoɔ akuakuo no hɔ, na ɔbaa fie. Na n’asuafoɔ no baa ne nkyɛn bɛbisaa sɛ: Kyerɛ yɛn afuo mu wura bɔne ho bɛ no ase.
Na ɔbua see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Deɛ ɔgu aba pa no ne onipa ba no;
afuo no ne wiase; aba pa no ne ahennie no mma; wura no ne ɔbɔnefoɔ no mma;
ɔtamfoɔ a ɔguiɛ no ne ɔbonsam; twa berɛ no ne wiase awieeɛ; twafoɔ no ne abɔfoɔ.
Enti sɛdeɛ wɔboaboa wura no ano na wɔde ogya hyeɛ no, saa ara na ɛbɛyɛ wiase awieeɛ.
Onipa ba no bɛsoma n’abɔfoɔ na wɔakɔboaboa suntidua ne wɔn a wɔdi nsɛmmɔne nyinaa ano afiri n’ahennie mu,
na wɔde wɔn akɔgu ogya fononoo mu; ɛhɔ na nnipa bɛsu na wɔatwɛre wɔn se.
Ɛnna ateneneefoɔ no bɛhyerɛn sɛ owia wɔn Agya ahennie mu. Deɛ ɔwɔ aso no, ma no ntie!
Ɔsoro ahennie no te sɛ agyapadeɛ bi a wɔde asie afuo mu; ɛno na onipa bi kɔhunuiɛ, na ɔkataa soɔ, na ɛho anigyeɛ nti, ɔkɔ kɔtɔnee deɛ ɔwɔ nyinaa de kɔtɔɔ afuo no.
Bio ɔsoro ahennie te sɛ odwadini bi a ɔrehwehwɛ ahwene pa;
na ɔhunuu ahweneɛ baako a ne boɔ yɛ den no, ɔkɔtɔnee deɛ ɔwɔ nyinaa de kɔtɔe.
Bio ɔsoro ahennie te sɛ asau a wɔde guu po mu na ɛbumaa nam ahodoɔ nyinaa bi;
na ɛyɛɛ ma, na wɔtwe baa mpoano, na wɔtenaa ase boaboaa deɛ ɛyɛ no ano guu akodoɔ mu, na deɛ ɛnyɛ no, wɔto gui.
Sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ wiase awieeɛ no mu ara ne no. Abɔfoɔ no bɛba abɛfa nnipa bɔne afiri ateneneefoɔ mu,
na wɔato wɔn agu ogya fononoo mu; ɛhɔ na nnipa bɛsu na wɔatwɛre wɔn se.
Moate yeinom nyinaa ase anaa? Wɔbuaa no sɛ: Aane.
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: Yei nti ɔtwerɛfoɔ biara a wɔayɛ no osuani ama ɔsoro ahennie no te sɛ efiewura bi a ɔfiri n’agyapadeɛ mu yi nnoɔma foforɔ ne dada adie.

verse.content: Na ɛbaa sɛ Yesu wiee mmɛ yi buo no, ɔfiri hɔ kɔeɛ.
Na ɔkɔɔ ɔno ara ne kurom no, ɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ wɔn, wɔn hyiadan mu maa no yɛɛ wɔn ahodwiri, na wɔkaa sɛ: Ɛhe na oyi de nyansa ne tumi nnwuma yi fire?
Ɛnyɛ duadwumfoɔ no ba no nie? Wɔmfrɛ ne na Maria, ne ne nuanom Yakobo, Yosef, Simon ne Yuda?
Na ɛnyɛ ne nua mmaanom nyinaa na wɔne yɛn wɔ ha yi anaa? Na afei ɛhe na oyi kɔnyaa yeinom nyinaa?
Na ɔyɛɛ suntidua maa wɔn. Na Yesu see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Anidie mmɔ odiyifoɔ, gye ne kurom ne ne fie.

verse.content: Na wɔn gyeɛ a wɔnnye nnie nti, wanyɛ tumi nnwuma pii wɔ hɔ.

note.content: Yei yɛ dua bi a ne kɛseɛ te sɛ asaa dua, na n’aba yɛ nketenkete.
Tete atwerɛ a wɔagye atom no bi ka sɛ:

verse.content: Ɛberɛ no mu no, Ɔmansinihene Herode tee Yesu nka
na ɔsee n’asomfo sɛ: Yohane suboni no ne no; wanyane afiri awufoɔ mu, na ɛno nti na tumideɛ yi yɛ adwuma wɔ ne mu yi.
Na Herode asɔ Yohane mu akye no de no akɔto afiase, ne nua Filipo yere Herodia nti.
Ɛfiri sɛ Yohane ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Wonni ho kwan sɛ woware no.
Na ɔpɛɛ sɛ ɔkum no, nanso na ɔsuro nkurɔfoɔ no, ɛfiri sɛ na wɔbu no sɛ odiyifoɔ.
Na Herode awoda duruiɛ no, Herodia babaa bɛsaa wɔn anim na ɛyɛɛ Herode fɛ.
Ɛno nti ɔkaa ntam hyɛɛ no bɔ sɛ ɔbɛma no biribiara a ɔbɛbisa.
Na ne na tuu no fo bɔne maa no bɛkaa sɛ: Fa Osuboni Yohane ti to plɛte so ma me ha yi ara!
Na ɛyɛɛ ɔhene no ya, nanso ne ntam ne wɔn a wɔne no te adidiiɛ no nti, ɔhyɛɛ sɛ wɔmfa mma no.
Na ɔsoma maa wɔkɔtwaa Yohane ti wɔ afiase hɔ.
Na wɔde ne tiri no too plɛte so baeɛ, na wɔde maa ababaa no, na ɔde kɔmaa ne na.
Na n’asuafoɔ no ba bɛfaa amu no kɔsiee, na wɔbɛka kyerɛɛ Yesu.
Na Yesu teeɛ no, ɔtenaa kodoɔ mu firii hɔ kɔɔ ɛserɛ so, nkyɛn baabi. Na nkurɔfoɔ akuakuo no teeɛ no, wɔfirii nkuro so nam fam tii no.
Na ɔsii fam bɛhunuu nkurɔfoɔ pii, na wɔyɛɛ no mmɔbɔ, na ɔsaa wɔn mu ayarefoɔ yadeɛ.
Na onwunu dwoeɛ no, n’asuafoɔ no baa ne nkyɛn bɛsee no sɛ: Ɛha yi yɛ ɛserɛ so, na onwunu nso adwo, gya nkurɔfoɔ akuakuo no kwan na wɔnkɔ nkuraa nkɔtɔ aduane nni!
Na Yesu see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Ɛnhia sɛ wɔkorɔ, mo ara momma wɔn biribi nni!

verse.content: Na wɔsee no sɛ: Yɛnni biribiara wɔ ha, gye paanoo nnum ne mpataa mmienu.
Ɛnna ɔse:

wj.content: Momfa mmrɛ me ha!

verse.content: Na ɔhyɛɛ nkurɔfoɔ akuakuo no sɛ wɔntenatena ɛserɛ no so, na ɔfaa paanoo nnum ne mpataa mmienu no, na ɔhwɛɛ soro hyiraa so; na ɔbubuu mu de paanoo no maa n’asuafoɔ, na asuafoɔ no nso de maa nkurɔfoɔ akuakuo no.
Na wɔn nyinaa didi meeɛ, na mporoporowa a ɛkaeɛ no yɛɛ nkɛntɛn dummienu mama.
Na wɔn a wɔdiiɛ no bɛyɛ mmarima mpemnum, mmaa ne mmɔfra nka ho.
Na ntɛm ara na Yesu hyɛɛ asuafoɔ no sɛ wɔnkɔ kodoɔ mu, nni kan ntwa nkɔ asuogya nohoa, na ɔnnya nkurɔfoɔ akuakuo no kwan ansa.
Na ɔwiee nkurɔfoɔ akuakuo no kwan gya no, ɔkɔɔ bepɔ so fa baabi mpaebɔ. Na onwunu dwoeɛ no, na aka ɔno nko ara wɔ hɔ.
Na kodoɔ no aduru ɛpo no mfimfini, na asorɔkyeɛ reha no, ɛfiri sɛ na mframa no rehyia wɔn.
Na ahemadakye nnɔnmmiɛnsa rekɔ no, Yesu nam po so baa wɔn nkyɛn.
Na asuafoɔ no hunuu no sɛ ɔnam po no soɔ no, wɔn akoma tuiɛ, na wɔkaa sɛ: Ɛyɛ ɔsaman! Na wɔde ehu teateaa mu.
Na ntɛm ara Yesu kasa kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Momma mo bo ntɔ mo yam, ɛyɛ me, monnsuro!

verse.content: Na Petro buaa no sɛ: Awurade, sɛ ɛyɛ wo deɛ a, ka ma memmra wo nkyɛn nsuo no ani!
Na ɔse:

wj.content: Bra!

verse.content: Na Petro firii kodoɔ no mu si faa nsuo no ani sɛ ɔrekɔ Yesu nkyɛn.
Na ɔhunuu mframa no, ɔsuroe; na ɔfirii aseɛ sɛ ɔremem no, ɔteaa mu sɛ: Awurade, gye me!
Na ntɛm ara Yesu tenee ne nsa sɔɔ no mu, na ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ:

wj.content: Wo a wo gyidie sua! Adɛn nti na wogyee akyinnyeɛ?

verse.content: Na wɔduruu kodoɔ no mu no, mframa no gyaeeɛ.
Na wɔn a wɔwɔ kodoɔ no mu no ba bɛkotoo no sɛ: Nyankopɔn ba ne wo ampa!
Na wɔtwaeɛ no, wɔduruu Genesaret asase so.
Na nnipa a wɔwɔ hɔ no hunuu no no, wɔsoma maa wɔkɔɔ asase a atwa ahyia no nyinaa so, na wɔde wɔn a wɔyareɛ nyinaa brɛɛ no,
na wɔsrɛɛ no sɛ ɔmma wɔmfa wɔn nsa nka n’atadeɛ ano nnwo nko ara. Na dodoɔ a wɔde wɔn nsa kaeɛ no ho yɛɛ wɔn den.
Ɛnna Atwerɛfoɔ ne Farisifoɔ firi Yerusalem baa Yesu nkyɛn bɛkaa sɛ:
Adɛn nti na w’asuafoɔ no nni mpanimfoɔ atetesɛm no soɔ? Wɔnhohoro wɔn nsa ansa na wɔadidi.
Na Yesu buaa wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Adɛn nti na mo nso mo atetesɛm nti, monni Nyankopɔn ahyɛdeɛ soɔ?
Na Onyankopɔn ahyɛ sɛ: Di w’agya ne wo na ni, na deɛ ɔka agya anaa ɛna ho asɛmmɔne no, owuo na ma no nwuo.
Na mo deɛ mose: Obiara a ɔbɛse n’agya anaa ne na sɛ: Deɛ anka wobɛnya no me hɔ no yɛ ayɛyɛdeɛ no,
na ɛnni sɛ ɔdi n’agya anaa ne na ni, na mo atetesɛm nti moasɛe Nyankopɔn asɛm.
Nyaatwomfoɔ! Ɛdi sɛ Yesaia hyɛɛ mo ho nkɔm sɛ:
Ɔman yi de wɔn anofafa na ɛdi me ni,
na wɔn akoma deɛ, atwe afiri me ho kɔ akyirikyiri.
Na wɔsɔre me kwa,
wɔkyerɛkyerɛ nsɛm a nnipa ahyehyɛ.

verse.content: Na ɔfrɛɛ nkurɔfokuo no ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Montie, na monte aseɛ.
Ɛnyɛ deɛ ɛkɔ anomu na ɛgu onipa ho fi, na mmom deɛ ɛfiri anomu ba na ɛgu onipa ho fi.

verse.content: Ɛnna n’asuafoɔ no baa ne nkyɛn bɛka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Wonim sɛ Farisifoɔ no tee asɛm yi no, ato wɔn suntidua?
Na ɔbuaa sɛ:

wj.content: Dua biara a ɛnyɛ me soro Agya na ɔduaeɛ no, wɔbɛtu.
Monnyaa wɔn, wɔyɛ anifirafoɔ a wɔkyerɛ anifirafoɔ kwan; na sɛ onifirani kyerɛ onifirani kwan a, wɔn baanu nyinaa bɛtɔ amena mu.

verse.content: Na Petro bua see no sɛ: Kyerɛ yɛn bɛ no ase!
Na ɔse:

wj.content: Mo nso moda so nte aseɛ ara?
Monhunu sɛ adeɛ biara a ɛkɔ anomu no kɔ ɔyafunu mu na ɛyi gu yaane mu anaa?
Na deɛ ɛfiri anomu firi adie deɛ, ɛfiri onipa akoma mu, na ɛno na ɛgu onipa ho fi.
Na akoma mu na adwemmɔne, awudisɛm, ayefasɛm, adwamansɛm, awifosɛm, adansekurumu ne abususɛm fire.
Yeinom ne nnoɔma a ɛgu onipa ho fi; na sɛ wɔde nsa a wɔanhohorɔ didi a, ɛngu onipa ho fi.

verse.content: Na Yesu firi hɔ kɔɔ Tiro ne Sidon fa mu.
Na hwɛ, Kanaanni baa bi a ɔfiri mpɔtamu hɔ ba bɛteateaa mu sɛ: O Awurade, Dawid ba, hu me mmɔbɔ, na honhommɔne bi reha me babaa dodo!
Nanso wammua no. Na n’asuafoɔ no ba bɛsrɛɛ no sɛ: Gya no kwan ma no nkɔ, na ɔreteateam di yɛn akyi.
Na ɔbuaa sɛ:

wj.content: Israel fie nnwan a wɔayera no nko ara nkyɛn na wɔsomaa me.

verse.content: Na ɔbaa no ba bɛkotoo no sɛ: Awurade, boa me!
Na ɔbuaa sɛ:

wj.content: Ɛnyɛ fɛ sɛ wɔfa mma aduane to ma nkraman mma.

verse.content: Na ɔse: Ɛwom, Awurade, nanso nkraman mma no nso di mporoporowa a ɛfiri wɔn wuranom pono so gu fam no bi.
Ɛnna Yesu bua see no sɛ:

wj.content: O, ɔbaa, wo gyidie so; ɛnyɛ mma wo sɛdeɛ wopɛ no.

verse.content: Na amonom hɔ ara ne babaa no ho yɛɛ no den.
Na Yesu firi hɔ baa Galilea po ho. Na ɔkɔɔ bepɔ so kɔtenaa ase wɔ hɔ.
Na nkurɔfoɔ akuakuo pii de mpakye, mmubuafoɔ, anifirafoɔ, emum ne afoforɔ pii baa ne nkyɛn, na wɔde wɔn bɛguu ne nan ase, na ɔsaa wɔn yadeɛ
maa no yɛɛ nkurɔfokuo no nwanwa, berɛ a wɔhunuu sɛ emum rekasa, na mpakye ho sane, na mmubuafoɔ nanteɛ, na anifirafoɔ hunu adeɛ; na wɔhyɛɛ Israel Nyankopɔn animuonyam.
Na Yesu frɛɛ n’asuafoɔ no see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Nkurɔfokuo yi yɛ me mmɔbɔ sɛ wɔatena me nkyɛn atoa so nnansa nie, na wɔnni biribi a wɔdie; nanso mempɛ sɛ megya wɔn kwan ma wɔde yafumpan korɔ, na wɔankɔtotɔ baha ɔkwan mu.

verse.content: Na asuafoɔ no see no sɛ: Ɛhe na yɛbɛnya paanoo a ɛbɛso nkurɔfokuo pii sɛɛ wɔ anwea pradada so ha?
Na Yesu see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Paanoo ahe na mowɔ?

verse.content: Na wɔse: Nson ne mpataa nketewa bi.
Na ɔhyɛɛ nkurɔfoɔ akuakuo no sɛ wɔntenatena fam.
Na ɔfaa paanoo nson no ne mpataa no, na ɔdaa ase, na ɔbubu de maa n’asuafoɔ no, na asuafoɔ no nso de maa nkurɔfoɔ akuakuo no.
Na wɔn nyinaa di meeɛ, na wɔtasetasee mporoporowa a ɛkaeɛ no nkɛntɛn nson mama.
Na wɔn a wɔdiiɛ no yɛ mmarima mpemnan a wɔankan mmaa ne mmɔfra anka ho.
Na ɔgyaa nkurɔfoɔ akuakuo no kwan no, ɔfaa kodoɔ na ɔbaa Magadan ahyeɛ so.
Na Farisifoɔ ne Sadukifoɔ no ba bɛsɔɔ no hwɛe, srɛɛ no sɛ ɔnkyerɛ wɔn ɔsoro nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ bi.
Na ɔbua see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Ɛduru anwummerɛ a, mose: Ewiem bɛte ɛfiri sɛ ɔsoro abere.
Na anɔpa mose: Ahum bɛtu nnɛ, ɛfiri sɛ ɔsoro abere na ayɛ kusuu. Monim ɔsoro ani nsɛm mu kyerɛ, na mmerɛ no ho nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ deɛ, montumi nkyerɛ mu.
Nnɛ mma abɔnefoɔ ne awaresɛefoɔ hwehwɛ nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ, na wɔremma wɔn nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ biara, gye Yona nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ no.

verse.content: Na ɔgyaa wɔn hɔ kɔeɛ.
Na asuafoɔ no duruu asuogya nohoa no, na wɔn werɛ afiri sɛ wɔfa paanoo.
Na Yesu see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Monhwɛ na monhwɛ mo ho yie Farisifoɔ ne Sadukifoɔ mmɔreka ho!

verse.content: Na wɔdwendwenee wɔn mu kekaa sɛ: Yɛamfa paanoo no ntira.
Na Yesu hunuiɛ no, ɔkaa sɛ:

wj.content: O nnipa a mo gyidie sua! Adɛn na moredwendwene mo mu sɛ moamfa paanoo ntira?
Monnya nhunui, na monkae nnipa mpemnum paanoo nnum no ne nkɛntɛn dodoɔ a monyaeɛ?
Anaasɛ nnipa mpemnan paanoo nson ne nkɛntɛn bebree a monyaeɛ?
Ɛdeɛn nti na monhunu sɛ ɛnyɛ paanoo ho asɛm na mereka mekyerɛ mo? Monhwɛ mo ho yie Farisifoɔ ne Sadukifoɔ mmɔreka ho!

verse.content: Ɛnna wɔhunuu sɛ wanka sɛ wɔnhwɛ wɔn ho yie paanoo mmɔreka ho, na mmom Farisifoɔ ne Sadukifoɔ no nkyerɛkyerɛ ho.
Na Yesu duruu Kaesarea Filipi fam no, ɔbisaa n’asuafoɔ no sɛ:

wj.content: Nnipa se Onipa Ba no ne hwan?

verse.content: Na wɔse: Ebinom se: Yohane suboni no. Ebinom se: Elia. Na ebinom nso se: Yeremia anaa adiyifoɔ no mu baako.
Ɔbisaa wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Na mo nso, mose mene hwan?

verse.content: Na Simon Petro buaa sɛ: Wone Kristo no, Onyankopɔn teasefoɔ no ba!
Ɛnna Yesu bua see no sɛ:

wj.content: Nhyira ne wo, Yona ba Simon, ɛfiri sɛ ɛnyɛ ɔhonam ne mogya na ɛyi kyerɛɛ woɔ, na m’agya a ɔwɔ soro no.
Na me nso mese wo sɛ: Wone Petro, na ɔbotan yi so na mede m’asafo bɛsie, na Asamando apono remmu mfa so.
Na mede ɔsoro ahennie nsafoa bɛma wo, na biribiara a wobɛkyekyere asase soɔ no, na wɔakyekyere no soro, na biribiara a wobɛsane no asase soɔ no, na wɔasane no soro.

verse.content: Ɛnna ɔhyɛɛ asuafoɔ no ketee sɛ wɔnnka nnkyerɛ obiara sɛ ɔno ne Kristo no.

Na ɛfiri saa berɛ no na Yesu Kristo fitii aseɛ kyerɛɛ n’asuafoɔ no sɛ, ɛsɛ sɛ ɔkɔ Yerusalem na ɔkɔhunu amane pii mpanimfoɔ ne asɔfoɔ mpanimfoɔ ne Atwerɛfoɔ no nsam, na wɔakum no, na ɛda a ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa no wanyane.
Ɛnna Petro de no kɔɔ nkyɛn, na ɔfitii aseɛ twii n’anim sɛ: Ɛmpare wo, Awurade, yei remma wo so da!
Na ɔdanee ne ho see Petro sɛ:

wj.content: Firi me so, Satan! Woyɛ suntidua ma me, ɛfiri sɛ wonnwene Nyankopɔn deɛ, na mmom nnipa deɛ na wodwene.

verse.content: Ɛnna Yesu see n’asuafoɔ no sɛ:

wj.content: Sɛ obi pɛ sɛ ɔdi m’akyire a, ma no mpa ne ho akyi, na ɔmma n’asɛnnua so, na ɔnni m’akyi.
Na obiara a ɔpɛ sɛ ɔgye ne kra nkwa no, ɛbɛfiri ne nsa; na obiara a me nti ne kra bɛyera no deɛ, ne nsa bɛka.
Na sɛ onipa nya wiase nyinaa na ɔhwere ne kra a, mfasoɔ bɛn na ɔbɛnya? Anaasɛ, ɛdeɛn na onipa bɛma de asesa ne kra?
Na Onipa Ba no de n’agya animuonyam ne n’abɔfoɔ na ɛbɛba; ɛno na ɔbɛtua onipa biara ka sɛdeɛ ne nneyɛɛ teɛ.
Nokorɛ mese mo sɛ: Nnipa binom gyina ha a wɔrenka owuo nhwɛ kɔsi sɛ wɔbɛhunu Onipa Ba no sɛ ɔreba n’ahennie mu.

verse.content: Na nnansia akyiri no, Yesu faa Petro ne Yakobo ne ne nua Yohane de wɔn kɔɔ bepɔ tentene bi so wɔ fa baabi.
Na ɔsakyeraa wɔ wɔn anim, na n’anim hyerɛnee sɛ owia, na ne ntadeɛ yɛɛ fitaa sɛ hann.
Na hwɛ, Mose ne Elia yii wɔn ho adi kyerɛɛ wɔn ne no kasaeɛ.
Ɛnna Petro ka kyerɛɛ Yesu sɛ: Awurade, ɛyɛ sɛ yɛtena ha; sɛ wopɛ a, mɛbɔ asese mmiɛnsa, wo deɛ baako, Mose deɛ baako, na Elia deɛ baako.
Na ɔgu so rekasa no, hwɛ, mununkum hyɛnhyɛn bi bɛkataa wɔn so, na hwɛ, ɛnne bi firi mununkum no mu kaa sɛ: Oyi ne me dɔba a ɔsɔ m’ani. Montie no!
Na asuafoɔ no teeɛ no, wɔde wɔn anim butubutuu fam, na wɔsuroo yie.
Na Yesu ba bɛsosɔɔ wɔn mu sɛ:

wj.content: Monsɔre, na monnsuro!

verse.content: Na wɔmemaa wɔn ani soɔ no, wɔanhunu obiara gye Yesu nko ara.
Na wɔfiri bepɔ no so resiane no, Yesu hyɛɛ wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Monnka deɛ moahunu yi nnkyerɛ obiara kɔsi sɛ onipa ba no bɛsɔre afiri awufoɔ mu.

verse.content: Na asuafoɔ no bisaa no sɛ: Adɛn nti na Atwerɛfoɔ no ka sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ Elia ba ansa?
Na Yesu bua see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Elia ba na wabɛsiesie nnoɔma nyinaa deɛ,
nanso mese mo sɛ: Elia aba dada, na wɔanhu no, na wɔyɛɛ no deɛ wɔpɛ nyinaa. Saa ara nso na Onipa Ba no rebɛhunu amaneɛ wɔn nsam.

verse.content: Ɛnna asuafoɔ no tee aseɛ sɛ Yohane suboni ho asɛm na ɔreka wɔn.
Na wɔduruu nkurɔfokuo no nkyɛn no, onipa bi baa ne nkyɛn bɛkotoo no
sɛ: Awurade, hu me ba yi mmɔbɔ, na ɔtwa, na ɔrehunu amane pii; na ɔtaa tɔ ogya mu, na ɔtaa tɔ nsuo mu.
Na mede no mebrɛɛ w’asuafoɔ no, nanso wɔantumi ansa no yadeɛ.
Na Yesu kaa sɛ:

wj.content: O nnɛ mma a monni gyidie na moakyea, me ne mo ntena hɔ nkɔduru da bɛn? Mento me bo ase mma mo nkɔsi da bɛn? Momfa no mmrɛ me ha!

verse.content: Na Yesu teateaa no, na honhommɔne no firi ne mu firii adi, na ɛfiri dɔn no ara mu na abɔfra no yadeɛ no gyaeeɛ.
Ɛnna asuafoɔ no baa Yesu nkyɛn ɛfa baabi, na wɔbisaa no sɛ: Adɛn nti na yɛantumi antu no?
Na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Ɛfiri sɛ mo gyidie sua; na nokorɛ mese mo sɛ, mowɔ gyidie sɛ sinapi fua a, anka mobɛka akyerɛ bepɔ yi sɛ: Tu firi ha kɔ nohoa, na ɛbɛtu, na anka biribiara nni hɔ a morentumi nyɛ.

verse.content: (Nanso saa adeɛ yi deɛ, n’adeban, ɛntumi ntu gye sɛ ɛnam mpaebɔ ne mmuada so.)
Na wɔrekyinkyini Galilea no, Yesu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Wɔrebɛyi Onipa Ba no ahyɛ nnipa nsa,
na wɔakum no, na da a ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa no, ɔbɛnyane.

verse.content: Na ɛyɛɛ wɔn awerɛho pii.
Na wɔduruu Kapernaum no, wɔn a wɔgyegye dwetɛbena fa toɔ
no baa Petro nkyɛn sɛ: Mo kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ no ntua ɛtoɔ no anaa?
Ɔse: Ɔtua. Na ɔbaa fie no, Yesu dii kan bisaa no sɛ:

wj.content: Simon, wodwene ho sɛn? Ɛhefoɔ hɔ na asase so ahemfo gyegye adwadeɛ anaa toɔ? Wɔn mma hɔ anaa ananafoɔ hɔ?

verse.content: Na ɔbuaa sɛ ananafoɔ hɔ no, Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ:

wj.content: Ɛnneɛ na mma no de wɔn ho.
Nanso sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ na yɛrento wɔn suntidua nti, kɔ mpoano kɔto darewa, na apataa a ɔbɛba kane no, wobue n’anomu a, wobɛhunu dwetɛbena wɔ mu, ɛno na fa kɔma ma me ne woɔ.

note.content: Tete atwerɛ a wɔgye tomu no binom mfa nkyekyɛmu 21 nka ho.
Didrakma. Yei yɛ ɛtoɔ a na Yudani barima biara tua no afe biara ma wɔde hwɛ asɔrefie hɔ.

verse.content: Ɛdɔn no ara mu na asuafoɔ no baa Yesu nkyɛn bɛbisaa sɛ: Hwan ne ɔkɛseɛ koraa wɔ ɔsoro ahennie no mu?
Na Yesu frɛɛ abɔfra bi de no bɛgyinaa wɔn mfimfini,
na ɔkaa sɛ:

wj.content: Nokorɛ mese mo sɛ, moannane na moanyɛ sɛ mmɔfra a, morentumi nhyɛne ɔsoro ahennie no mu.
Enti obiara a ɔbɛbrɛ ne ho ase sɛ abɔfra yi no, ɔno ara ne ɔkɛseɛ koraa ɔsoro ahennie no mu.
Na obiara a ɔbɛgye abɔfra a ɔte sɛɛ baako me din mu no, wagye me;
na obiara a ɔbɛto nkumaa a wɔgye me die yi mu baako suntidua no, ɛyɛ ma no sɛ wɔde awiyammoɔ sɛne ne kɔn, na wɔkɔdɔ no asukɔ wɔ ɛpo bunu mu.
Suntiduatoɔ nti wiase nnue! Na ɛtwa sɛ suntiduatoɔ ba deɛ, nanso onipa a suntiduatoɔ nam ne so ba no nnue!
Na sɛ wo nsa anaa wo nan to wo suntidua a, twa, na to firi wo ho twene! Na ɛyɛ ma wo sɛ wode nansini anaa nsasini bɛkɔ nkwa mu sene sɛ wowɔ nsa mmienu anaa nan mmienu, na wɔde wo bɛto daa ogya no mu.
Na sɛ w’ani to wo suntidua a, tu, na to firi wo ho twene! Na ɛyɛ ma wo sɛ wode ani korɔ bɛkɔ nkwa mu, sene sɛ wowɔ ani mmienu, na wɔde wo bɛto ogya amanehunu kuro mu.
Monhwɛ na moantiatia nkumaa yi mu baako anim, na mese mo sɛ ɔsoro hɔ, wɔn abɔfoɔ hwɛ m’agya a ɔwɔ soro no anim daa.
[Na Onipa Ba no baa sɛ ɔrebɛgye deɛ ayera.]
Modwene ho sɛn? Sɛ onipa bi wɔ nnwanten ɔha, na wɔn mu baako fom kwan a, ɔrennya aduɔkron nkron no mmepɔ so, na ɔnkɔhwehwɛ deɛ wafom kwan no anaa?
Na sɛ ɛba sɛ ɔhu no a, nokorɛ mese mo sɛ, n’ani gye ne ho sene aduɔkron nkron a wɔamfom kwan no ho.
Saa ara na ɛnyɛ adeɛ a Agya a ɔwɔ soro no pɛ, sɛ nkumaa yi mu baako bɛyera.
Na sɛ wo nua fom wo a, kɔ na kɔyi no atɛn, wo ne no nko ara ntam. Sɛ ɔtie wo a, woanya wo nua.
Na sɛ wantie a, fa onipa baako anaa baanu ka wo ho, na asɛm no nyinaa nnyina adansefoɔ mmienu anaa mmiɛnsa anomu.
Na sɛ wantie wɔn nso a, kɔka kyerɛ asafo no. Na sɛ wantie asafo no nso a, ɛnneɛ bu no sɛ ɔbosonsonni ne togyeni.
Nokorɛ mese mo sɛ, biribiara a mobɛkyekyere no asase soɔ no, wɔbɛkyekyere no soro; na biribiara a mobɛsane no asase soɔ no, wɔbɛsane no soro.
Bio, nokorɛ mese mo sɛ, mo mu baanu yɛ anokorɔ asase so wɔ asɛm biara a mobɛbisa ho a, m’agya a ɔwɔ soro no bɛyɛ ama mo.
Na deɛ baanu anaa baasa ahyiam me din mu no, ɛhɔ na mewɔ wɔn mfimfini.

verse.content: Ɛnna Petro baa ne nkyɛn bɛbisaa no sɛ: Awurade, mprɛ ahe na me nua fom me a, memfa nkyɛ no? Ɛnkɔsi mprɛnson anaa?
Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ:

wj.content: Mense wo sɛ ɛnkɔsi mprɛ nson, na mmom mprɛ aduɔson ahodoɔ nson.
Yei nti ɔsoro ahennie te sɛ ɔhene bi a ɔpɛɛ sɛ ɔne ne nkoa bu nkonta.
Na ɔfitii aseɛ buiɛ no, wɔde ɔbaako a ɔde no ɛka talente
ɔpedu brɛɛ no.
Na ɛnam sɛ ɔnni deɛ ɔde bɛtua nti, ne wura no hyɛɛ sɛ wɔntɔn no, ne ne yere ne ne mma, ne deɛ ɔwɔ nyinaa na wɔmfa mmɛtua ka no.
Ɛnna akoa no gyae ne ho too fam wɔ n’anim srɛɛ no sɛ: Owura to wo bo ase ma me, na mɛtua wo ne nyinaa.
Na akoa no wura no hunuu no mmɔbɔ, na ɔgyaee no, na ɔde ka no kyɛɛ no.
Na akoa no ara firii adie no, ɔkɔhunuu ne nwirakwaa no mu baako a ɔde no denare
ɔha; na ɔsɔɔ no mu, tim no amenewa kaa sɛ: Tua me ka!
Na n’awirakwaa no nso de ne ho hwee fam srɛɛ no sɛ: To wo bo ase ma me, na mɛtua.
Nanso ɔno deɛ, wampene, na ɔde no kɔtoo afiase sɛ ɛnkɔsi sɛ ɔbɛtua ɛka no.
Na nwirakwaa no hunuu deɛ ɛsiiɛ no, ɛyɛɛ wɔn ya pii, na wɔba bɛkaa deɛ ɛsiiɛ no nyinaa kyerɛɛ wɔn wura no.
Ɛnna ne wura no frɛɛ no see no sɛ: Akoa bɔne, wosrɛɛ me nti, mede ɛka no nyinaa mekyɛɛ wo;
ɛnsɛ sɛ wo nso wohunu w’awirakwaa mmɔbɔ sɛdeɛ mehunuu wo mmɔbɔ no anaa?
Na ne wura no bo fui, na ɔde no maa ahohiahiafoɔ sɛ ɛnkɔsi sɛ ɔbɛtua no deɛ ɔde no nyinaa.
Saa ara na sɛ mo mu biara amfiri n’akomam amfa ne nua mfomsoɔ ankyɛ no a, me soro Agya nso bɛyɛ no.

note.content: Tete atwerɛ a wogye tomu no binom mfa nkyekyɛmu 11 nka ho.
Na talɛnte baako yɛ deɛ ɛboro ɔpaani mfeɛ dunum akatua.
Na denare yɛ ɔpaani da koro akatua.

verse.content: Na ɛbaa sɛ Yesu wiee nsɛm yi ka no, ɔfirii Galilea, na ɔbaa Yudea ahyeɛ so, Yordan agya.
Na nkurɔfoɔ akuakuo pii dii n’akyi, na ɔsaa wɔn yadeɛ wɔ hɔ.
Na Farisifoɔ baa ne nkyɛn bɛsɔɔ no hwɛe, sɛ: Obi wɔ ho kwan sɛ asɛm biara nti ɔgyaa ne yere anaa?
Na ɔbua see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Monkenkanee sɛ ɛfiri mfitiaseɛ no, deɛ ɔbɔɔ onipa no, ɔbarima ne ɔbaa na ɔyɛɛ wɔn?

verse.content: Ɛnna ɔkaa sɛ:

wj.content: Yei nti na ɔbarima bɛgya agya ne ɛna, na ɔde ne ho akɔbata ne yere ho, na wɔn baanu abɛyɛ honam korɔ?
Enti na wɔnna so nyɛ baanu bio, na mmom wɔyɛ honam korɔ. Enti deɛ Onyankopɔn de abom no, mma onipa biara nntete mu.

verse.content: Wɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Na adɛn nti na Mose hyɛɛ sɛ wɔmma awaregyaeɛ nwoma, na wɔnnyaa no no?
Ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Mo akomaden nti na Mose maa mo kwan sɛ monnyaa mo yerenom; na ɛfiri mfitiaseɛ no, anka ɛnte saa.
Enti mese mo sɛ, sɛ ɛnyɛ adwamammɔ nti na obi gyaa ne yere na ɔware foforɔ a, na wasɛe awadeɛ; (na deɛ ɔbɛware deɛ wɔagyae no no nso asɛe awadeɛ.)

verse.content: Asuafoɔ no see no sɛ: Sɛ ɔbarima ne ne yere ntam asɛm te saa deɛ a, na ɛnyɛ sɛ wɔwareɛ.
Na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Ɛnyɛ nnipa nyinaa na ɛbɛtumi agye asɛm yi, gye wɔn a wɔde ama wɔn.

Na nnipa bi wɔ hɔ a wɔntumi nwareɛ a wɔwoo wɔn saa firii wɔn na yam, na ebinom nso wɔ hɔ a nnipa na ɛyɛɛ wɔn saa; na ebinom nso wɔ hɔ a ɔsoro ahennie nti na wɔayɛ wɔn ho saa. Deɛ ɔbɛtumi agyeɛ no, ma no nnye.

verse.content: Ɛnna wɔde mmɔfra brɛɛ no sɛ ɔmfa ne nsa ngu wɔn so mmɔ mpaeɛ mma wɔn; nanso asuafoɔ no kaa nnipa a wɔde wɔn baeɛ no anim.
Na Yesu kaa sɛ:

wj.content: Momma mmɔfra no kwan na monnsi wɔn me nkyɛn ba kwan; na yeinom sɛɛ yi na ɔsoro ahennie no yɛ wɔn dea.

verse.content: Na ɔde ne nsa guu wɔn so hyiraa wɔn na ɔfiri hɔ kɔeɛ.
Na hwɛ, obi baa hɔ bɛsee no sɛ: Kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ, adepa bɛn na menyɛ na manya daa nkwa?
Na ɔsee no sɛ:

wj.content: Adɛn nti na wobisa me papa ho asɛm? Ɔbaako na ɔyɛ. Na sɛ wopɛ sɛ wokɔ nkwa mu a, di mmara nsɛm no so!

verse.content: Ɔsee Yesu sɛ: Deɛ ɛwɔ he? Ɛnna Yesu se:

wj.content: Deɛ ɛse: Nni awu! Nsɛe awadeɛ! Mmɔ korɔno! Nni adansekurumu!
Di w’agya ne wo na ni! Dɔ wo yɔnko sɛ wo ho!

verse.content: Aberanteɛ no ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Madi yeinom nyinaa so. Ɛdeɛn na aka me bio?
Yesu see no sɛ:

wj.content: Sɛ wopɛ sɛ woyɛ pɛ a, kɔ na kɔtɔn deɛ wowɔ, na fa ma ahiafoɔ, na wobɛnya agyapadeɛ wɔ soro, na bra bɛdi m’akyi!

verse.content: Aberanteɛ no tee asɛm yi no, ɔde awerɛhoɔ kɔeɛ; ɛfiri sɛ na ɔwɔ ahonyadeɛ bebree.
Ɛnna Yesu ka kyerɛɛ n’asuafoɔ no sɛ:

wj.content: Nokorɛ mese mo sɛ, ɛyɛ den ma ɔdefoɔ sɛ ɔbɛkɔ ɔsoro ahennie mu.
Na bio mese mo sɛ, ɛyɛ mmerɛ ma yoma sɛ ɔbɛfa paneɛ tokuro mu sene sɛ ɔdefoɔ bɛkɔ Nyankopɔn ahennie mu.

verse.content: Na n’asuafoɔ no teeɛ no, ɛyɛɛ wɔn ahodwiri pii, na wɔkaa sɛ: Ɛnneɛ na hwan na wɔbɛtumi agye no nkwa?
Na Yesu hwɛɛ wɔn, see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Onipa fam na yei ntumi nyɛ hɔ, na Nyankopɔn fam deɛ nnoɔma nyinaa bɛtumi ayɛ hɔ.

verse.content: Ɛnna Petro bua see no sɛ: Hwɛ, yɛagya nnoɔma nyinaa hɔ abɛdi w’akyi. Ɛdeɛn koraa na yɛbɛnya?
Na Yesu see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Nokorɛ mese mo sɛ, mo a moabɛdi m’akyire yi, wiase foforɔ no mu no, ɛda a Onipa Ba no bɛtena n’animuonyam ahennwa soɔ no, mo nso mobɛtena ahennwa dummienu so, abu Israel mmusuakuo dummienu no atɛn.
Na obiara a me nti wagya afie, anaa nuammarima anaa nuammaa, anaa agya anaa ɛna anaa mma, anaa nsase hɔ no, ɔbɛnya no mmɔho ɔha na wanya daa nkwa afa.
Na adikanfoɔ pii bɛdi akyire, na akyikafoɔ abɛdi kan.

note.content: Tete atwerɛ a wɔgye tomu binom mfa saa ɔfa yi a ɛwɔ nkahyɛmudeɛ yi nka ho.

wj.content: Na ɔsoro ahennie te sɛ onipa bi a ɔyɛ afuowura a ɔfirii adi anɔpatutuutu sɛ ɔrekɔbɔ adwumayɛfoɔ paa akɔ ne turo mu.
Na ɔne adwumayɛfoɔ no dii ano sɛ da koro denare baako no, ɔmaa wɔkɔɔ ne bobe turo mu.
Na ɔfirii adi bɛyɛ anɔpa nnɔnkron kɔhunuu afoforɔ sɛ wɔgyinagyina dwa ase kwa.
Na ɔsee wɔn nso sɛ: Mo nso monkɔ me bobe turo mu, na akatua a ɛyɛ no na mede bɛma mo.
Na wɔkɔeɛ. Bio, ɛbɛyɛ awia dummienu ne nnɔn mmiɛnsa no, ɔfiri adi kɔyɛɛ saa ara.
Na ɛbɛyɛ anwummerɛ nnɔnnum mu no, ɔfirii adi kɔhunuu afoforɔ sɛ wɔgyinagyina hɔ kwa, na ɔsee wɔn sɛ: Adɛn nti na mogyinagyina ha kwa adekyeeɛ nyinaa yi?
Wɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Obiara mmɔɔ yɛn paa. Ɔsee wɔn sɛ: Mo nso monkɔ bobe turo mu hɔ!
Na ɛduruu anwummerɛ no, bobe turo no wura no ka kyerɛɛ ne hwɛsoni sɛ: Frɛ adwumayɛfoɔ no, na ma wɔn wɔn apaadeɛ firi wɔn a wɔdi akyire so kɔsi wɔn a wɔdi kan so.
Na wɔn a wɔfaa wɔn bɛyɛ anwummerɛ nnɔnnum baeɛ no, wɔn nyinaa nyaa denare denare.
Na adikanfoɔ no baeɛ no, wɔsusuu sɛ wɔbɛnya deɛ ɛkyɛne saa; na wɔn nso nyaa denare denare.
Na ɛkaa wɔn nsa no, wɔnwiinwii afuowura no so
sɛ: Akyikafoɔ yi deɛ, dɔnhwere baako pɛ na wɔyɛɛ adwuma, na woama wɔn ne yɛn a yɛfiri anɔpa ayɛ adwuma na owia ahye yɛn no pɛ.
Na ɔbua see wɔn mu baako sɛ: Awɛ, menyɛɛ wo bɔne; wo ne me anni ano denare anaa?
Fa wo deɛ na kɔ! Menni kwan sɛ mema deɛ ɔbaa akyire yi sɛ wo,
anaasɛ menni ho kwan sɛ mede me ara m’adeɛ meyɛ deɛ mepɛ anaa? Sɛ me yam yɛ nti na w’ani abere yi?
Saa na akyikafoɔ bɛdi kan, na adikanfoɔ adi akyire; (na wɔafrɛ bebree nanso kakraa bi na wɔayi wɔn.)

verse.content: Na Yesu reforo akɔ Yerusalem no, ɔfaa dummienu no nko ara kɔɔ nkyɛn, ɔkwan no mu, ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Hwɛ, yɛreforo akɔ Yerusalem, na wɔbɛyi Onipa Ba no ahyɛ asɔfoɔ mpanimfoɔ ne Atwerɛfoɔ nsa, na wɔabu no kumfɔ,
na wɔde no ahyɛ amanaman mufoɔ nsa sɛ wɔngoro ne ho, na wɔnka no mpire na wɔmmɔ no asɛnnua mu, na da a ɛtɔ so nnansa no ɔbɛnyane bio.

verse.content: Ɛnna Sebedeo mma no na, ne ne mma baa ne nkyɛn bɛkotoo no, na ɔsrɛɛ ne hɔ biribi.
Na Yesu bisaa no sɛ:

wj.content: Ɛdeɛn na wopɛ?

verse.content: Ɔbua see no sɛ: Ka ma me mma mmienu yi mu baako ntena wo nifa, na ɔbaako nso ntena wo benkum w’ahennie no mu.
Na Yesu buaa sɛ:

wj.content: Monnim deɛ morebisa. Mobɛtumi anom kuruwa a merebɛnom no anaa? (Anaasɛ, mobɛtumi ama wɔde asubɔ a wɔde rebɛbɔ me no abɔ mo anaa?)

verse.content: Wɔsee no sɛ: Yɛbɛtumi.
Na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Me kuruwa deɛ mobɛnom, (na m’asubɔ nso mobɛnya,)
na me nifa ne me benkum tena deɛ, ɛnyɛ me dea sɛ mede bɛma, na wɔde bɛma wɔn a m’agya asiesie ama wɔn.

verse.content: Na edu no teeɛ no, anuanom baanu no asɛm no anyɛ wɔn abodwoɔ.
Na Yesu frɛɛ wɔn bae, na ɔkaa sɛ:

wj.content: Monim sɛ wiase amanaman ahemfo di wɔn so sɛ awuranom, na wɔn mu akɛseɛ no di wɔn so tumi.
Na ɛnte saa mo mu; na mmom obiara a ɔpɛ sɛ ɔyɛ kɛseɛ mo mu no, ɔnyɛ mo somfoɔ,
na obiara a ɔpɛ sɛ ɔdi kan mo mu no, ɔnyɛ mo akoa,
sɛdeɛ Onipa Ba no amma sɛ wɔnsom no, na mmom ɔbɛsomee, na ɔde ne nkwa bɛyɛɛ agyedeɛ maa nnipa pii ne no.

verse.content: Na wɔfiri Yeriko rekorɔ no, nkurɔfokuo pii dii n’akyi.
Na hwɛ, anifirafoɔ mmienu a wɔtete kwankyɛn tee sɛ Yesu retwam no, wɔteateaa mu sɛ: Hu yɛn mmɔbɔ, Awurade, Dawid ba!
Na nkurɔfokuo no kaa wɔn anim sɛ wɔmmua wɔn ano. Ɛno mmom ma wɔteateaa mu denden sɛ: Hu yɛn mmɔbɔ, Awurade, Dawid ba!
Na Yesu gyina frɛɛ wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Ɛdeɛn na mopɛ sɛ meyɛ ma mo?

verse.content: Wɔsee no sɛ: Awurade, ma yɛn ani mmue!
Na Yesu hunuu wɔn mmɔbɔ, na ɔde ne nsa kaa wɔn ani; na ntɛm ara wɔhunuu adeɛ, na wɔdii n’akyi.

note.content: Tete atwerɛ a wɔgye tomu binom mfa saa ɔfa yi a ɛwɔ nkahyɛmudeɛ yi nka ho.
Tete atwerɛ a wɔgye tomu binom mfa saa ɔfa yi a ɛwɔ nkahyɛmudeɛ yi nka ho.
Tete atwerɛ a wɔgye tomu binom mfa saa ɔfa yi a ɛwɔ nkahyɛmudeɛ yi nka ho.

verse.content: Na wɔbɛnee Yerusalem na wɔduruu Betfage, Ngo Bepɔ ho no, Yesu somaa asuafoɔ baanu
see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Monkɔ akuraa a ɛda mo anim yi ase, na ntɛm ara mobɛhunu afunumu a wɔasa no homa ne ne ba; monsane wɔn mfa wɔn mmrɛ me!
Na sɛ obi bisa mo a, monka sɛ: Wɔn ho hia ma Awurade; na ntɛm ara ɔbɛma mode wɔn aba.

verse.content: Na yei nyinaa sii, na deɛ odiyifoɔ no kaeɛ no aba mu sɛ:

block_quote.content: Monka nkyerɛ Sion babaa sɛ:
Hwɛ, wo hene reba wo nkyɛn,
ɔdwo, na ɔte afunumu
ne afunumu a ɔsoa nnoɔma ba so.

verse.content: Na asuafoɔ no kɔ kɔyɛɛ sɛdeɛ Yesu hyɛɛ wɔn no
de afunumu no ne ne ba no baeɛ, na wɔde wɔn ntadeɛ guguu wɔn so, na ɔtenaa so.
Na nkurɔfokuo no mu pii de wɔn ntadeɛ sesɛɛ kwan no mu, na ebinom nso twitwaa dua mman, na wɔde sesɛɛ kwan no mu.
Na nkurɔfoɔ akuakuo a wɔdi kan ne wɔn a wɔdi akyire teateaa mu sɛ:

block_quote.content: Hosiana, Dawid ba no!
Nhyira ne deɛ ɔnam Awurade din mu reba no!
Hosiana wɔ sorosoro nohoa!

verse.content: Na ɔduruu Yerusalem no, kuro mu no nyinaa bɔɔ twi sɛ: Hwan ni?
Na nkurɔfoɔ akuakuo no se: Oyi ne Yesu, odiyifoɔ a ɔfiri Nasaret a ɛwɔ Galilea no.
Na Yesu kɔɔ asɔrefie, na ɔkɔpamm wɔn a wɔtɔn ne wɔn a wɔtɔ firii asɔrefie hɔ, na ɔkaa sikasesafoɔ apono ne wɔn a wɔtɔn mmorɔnoma nkonnwa butui.
Na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Wɔatwerɛ sɛ:
Wɔbɛfrɛ me fie mpaebɔfie,
na mo deɛ, mode ayɛ adwotwafoɔ bɔn.

verse.content: Na anifirafoɔ ne mpakye baa ne nkyɛn asɔrefie hɔ, na ɔsaa wɔn yadeɛ.
Na asɔfoɔ mpanimfoɔ ne Atwerɛfoɔ no hunuu anwanwadeɛ a ɔyɛeɛ, ne mmɔfra a wɔteateaa mu asɔrefie sɛ: Hosiana Dawid ba no no, anyɛ wɔn abodwo,
na wɔbisaa no sɛ: Wote deɛ yeinom reka no? Na Yesu see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Aane. Monkenkanee pɛn sɛ:
Nkɔkoaa ne wɔn a wɔnom nufoɔ ano mu
na woasiesie ayeyie, anaa?

verse.content: Na ɔgyaa wɔn hɔ firii kuro no mu kɔɔ Betania kɔtenaa hɔ.
Na anɔpa a Yesu resane aba kuro no mu no, na ɛkɔm de no.
Na ɔhunuu borɔdɔma bi kwan so no, ɔkɔɔ ho, na wanhunu hwee wɔ so sɛ ahahan nko ara. Na ɔsee no sɛ:

wj.content: Worenso aba bio ara da!

verse.content: Na amonom hɔ ara na borɔdɔma no poeɛ.
Na asuafoɔ no hunuiɛ no, ɛyɛɛ wɔn nwanwa, na wɔkaa sɛ: Ɛyɛɛ dɛn na amonom ha yi ara borɔdɔma yi apoɔ yi?
Na Yesu bua see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Nokorɛ mese mo sɛ, mowɔ gyidie na monnye akyinnyeɛ a, anka ɛnyɛ borɔdɔma yi deɛ nko na mobɛyɛ, na anka mobɛka akyerɛ bepɔ yi sɛ: Tutu na kɔhwe po mu! na ɛbɛyɛ.
Na biribiara a mobɛbisa mpaebɔ mu na mogye die no, mobɛnya.

verse.content: Na ɔduruu asɔrefie na ɔrekyerɛkyerɛ no, asɔfoɔ mpanimfoɔ ne ɔman no mu mpanimfoɔ baa ne nkyɛn bɛkaa sɛ: Tumi bɛn na wode yɛ nnoɔma yi, na hwan na ɔmaa wo saa tumi yi?
Na Yesu bua see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Me nso mɛbisa mo asɛm baako a, sɛ moyi m’ano a, me nso mɛka tumi a mede meyɛ nnoɔma yi makyerɛ mo:
Yohane asubɔ no, ɛfiri he? Ɛfiri soro anaasɛ ɛfiri nnipa?

verse.content: Na wɔsusuu wɔn mu sɛ: Sɛ yɛka sɛ ɛfiri soro a, ɔbɛse yɛn sɛ: Adɛn nti na moannye no annie?
Na sɛ yɛka sɛ ɛfiri nnipa a, yɛsuro nkurɔfokuo no; ɛfiri sɛ wɔn nyinaa bu Yohane sɛ odiyifoɔ.
Na wɔbuaa Yesu sɛ: Yɛnnim. Na ɔno nso ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Me nso merenka tumi ko a mede meyɛ yeinom menkyerɛ mo.
Na modwene yei ho sɛn? Ɔbarima bi wɔ mma baanu; na ɔkɔɔ deɛ ɔdi kan no hɔ sɛ: Ɔba, nnɛ kɔyɛ me bobe turo mu adwuma!
Na ɔba no buaa sɛ: Merenkɔ! Na akyire yi, ɔsesaa n’adwene, na ɔkɔeɛ.
Na ɔkɔɔ deɛ ɔka ho no hɔ, kɔkaa saa ara kyerɛɛ no. Na ɔbuaa sɛ: Owura mɛkɔ! nanso wankɔ.
Wɔn baanu yi mu hwan na ɔyɛɛ deɛ n’agya pɛ?

verse.content: Na wɔse: Deɛ ɔdi kan no. Yesu see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Nokorɛ mese mo sɛ, togyefoɔ ne nnwamamfoɔ redi mo anim akɔ Nyankopɔn ahennie mu.
Na Yohane nam tenenee kwan mu baa mo nkyɛn, na moannye no anni; na togyefoɔ ne nnwamamfoɔ na wɔgyee no diiɛ, na mo nso mohunuiɛ no, moannu mo ho akyire yi annye no anni.
Montie ɛbɛ foforɔ! Afuowura bi wɔ hɔ a ɔyɛɛ bobe turo, na ɔgyee ho ban hyiae, na ɔtuu mu nsa-kyi-amena, na ɔtoo aban tentene, na ɔde hyɛɛ ahwɛsofoɔ bi nsa, na ɔgyaa hɔ kɔɔ baabi.
Na aduaba berɛ duruiɛ no, ɔsomaa ne nkoa kɔɔ ahwɛsofoɔ no nkyɛn sɛ wɔnkɔgye n’aduaba mmra.
Na ahwɛsofoɔ no faa ne nkoa no, na wɔhwee bi, na wɔkumm bi, na wɔsii bi aboɔ.
Bio, ɔsomaa nkoa foforɔ a wɔdɔɔso sene akane deɛ no; nanso wɔyɛɛ wɔn saa ara.
Na akyire yi, ɔsomaa ne ba kɔɔ wɔn nkyɛn sɛ: Wɔbɛfɛre me ba.
Nanso ahwɛsofoɔ no hunuu ɔba no no, wɔkekaa wɔn mu sɛ: Oyi ne ɔdedifoɔ no; mommra mma yɛnkum no, na n’apɛgyadeɛ no nyɛ yɛn deɛ.
Na wɔfaa no twee no firi bobe turo no mu hɔ kɔkumm no.
Enti da a bobe turo wura no bɛba no, ɛdeɛn na ɔbɛyɛ ahwɛsofoɔ no?

verse.content: Wɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Ɔbɛsɛe nnipa bɔne no pasaa, na ɔde bobe turo no ama ahwɛsofoɔ foforɔ a wɔde aduaba bɛbrɛ no ne berɛ mu.
Yesu see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Monkenkanee twerɛ nsɛm no mu pɛn sɛ:
Ɔboɔ a abantofoɔ apoɔ no,
ɛno ara na abɛyɛ ɔdan no ntweaso tiboɔ;
yei firi Awurade
na ɛyɛ nwanwa yɛn ani so?
Yei nti mese mo sɛ: Wɔbɛgye Nyankopɔn ahennie no afiri mo nsam de akɔma ɔman a wɔde mu aduaba bɛba.
Na deɛ ɔbɛhwe ɔboɔ yi soɔ no, ne mu bɛbubu, na deɛ ɛbɛhwe ne soɔ no ɛbɛpɛkyɛ no.

verse.content: Na asɔfoɔ mpanimfoɔ ne Farisifoɔ no tee ne mmebuo no, wɔhunuu sɛ wɔn ho asɛm na ɔreka.
Na wɔhwehwɛɛ sɛ wɔkyere no nanso na wɔsuroo nkurɔfoɔ akuakuo no, ɛfiri sɛ na wɔbu no sɛ odiyifoɔ.
Na Yesu kasa kyerɛɛ wɔn mmebuo mu bio sɛ:

wj.content: Ɔsoro ahennie te sɛ ɔhene bi a ɔtoo ayeforɔ pono maa ne ba.
Na ɔsomaa ne nkoa sɛ wɔnkɔfrɛ wɔn a wɔato nsa afrɛ wɔn sɛ wɔmmra ayeforɔ no ase no, nanso wɔampɛ sɛ wɔba.
Bio ɔsomaa nkoa foforɔ sɛ: Monkɔka nkyerɛ wɔn a wɔahyia wɔn no sɛ: Hwɛ, masiesie m’aduane, wɔakum m’anantwie ne me nyɛmmoa, na wɔawie nnoɔma nyinaa; mommra ayeforɔ no ase!
Na wɔn deɛ, wɔamfa anyɛ hwee, na wɔkokɔe. Obi kɔɔ n’afuo mu, na obi nso kɔdii ne dwa.
Na wɔn a aka no kyekyeree ne nkoa no bɔɔ wɔn adapaa kunkumm wɔn.
Na ɔhene no teeɛ no, ne bo fuiɛ, na ɔsomaa ne dɔm maa wɔkɔkunkumm awudifoɔ no, na wɔhyee wɔn kuro.
Ɛnna ɔsee ne nkoa no sɛ: Wɔasiesie ayeforɔhyia no deɛ, nanso wɔn a wɔhyiaa wɔn no, ansɛ wɔn.
Enti monkɔ atempɔn nkwanta so, na dodoɔ a mobɛhu wɔn no, momfrɛ wɔn mmra ayeforɔ no ase.
Na nkoa no firii adi kɔɔ akwan so, kɔboaboaa dodoɔ a wɔhunuu wɔn no ano, nnipa bɔne ne nnipa pa; na ahɔhoɔ bɛhyɛɛ ayeforɔhyia dan no ma.
Na ɔhene no baa mu bɛhwɛɛ ahɔhoɔ no, ɔbɛhunuu onipa bi a ɔnhyɛ ayeforɔhyia atadeɛ wɔ hɔ.
Na ɔbisaa no sɛ: Awɛ, wobaa mu ha sɛn ni, na wonhyɛ ayeforɔhyia atadeɛ yi? Na ɔtɔree mum.
Ɛnna ɔhene no see asomfoɔ no sɛ: Monkyekyere ne nan ne ne nsa mfa no, nkɔto no ntwene akyirikyiri sum no mu; ɛhɔ na osu ne setwerɛ wɔ.
Na wɔn a wɔafrɛ wɔn no dɔɔso, nanso wɔn a wɔyi wɔn no deɛ, wɔyɛ kakraa bi.

verse.content: Ɛno na Farisifoɔ no kɔ kɔtuu agyina sɛdeɛ wɔbɛsum no fidie wɔ kasa mu.
Na wɔsomaa wɔn asuafoɔ kaa Herodefoɔ no ho baa ne nkyɛn sɛ: Kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ, yɛnim sɛ woyɛ ɔnokwafoɔ, na wokyerɛ Nyankopɔn kwan nokorɛ mu, nanso obiara asɛm mfa wo ho; na wonhwɛ nnipa anim.
Enti kyerɛ yɛn deɛ wodwene. Ɛwɔ ho kwan sɛ wɔyi toɔ ma Kaesare anaasɛ wɔnnyi?
Na Yesu hunuu wɔn amumuyɛ no, ɔkaa sɛ:

wj.content: Mo nyaatwomfoɔ, adɛn na moresɔ me ahwɛ?
Momfa ɛtoɔ sika no bi mmɛkyerɛ me! Na wɔde denare brɛɛ no.

verse.content: Na ɔbisaa wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Hwan mfonini ne n’atwerɛ nie?

verse.content: Wɔse: Kaesare dea. Ɛnna ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Ɛnneɛ momfa Kaesare deɛ mma Kaesare ne Nyankopɔn deɛ mma Onyankopɔn!

verse.content: Na wɔteeɛ no, ɛyɛɛ wɔn nwanwa; na wɔgyaa no hɔ kɔeɛ.
Da no ara na Sadukifoɔ a wɔka sɛ owusɔreɛ nni hɔ no baa ne nkyɛn bɛbisaa no
sɛ: Kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ, Mose kaa sɛ: Sɛ obi wu na ɔnni mma a, ne nua nware ne yere no na ɔnwo mma mma ne nua no.
Na anuanom baason bi tenaa yɛn nkyɛn ha. Deɛ ɔdi kan no waree, na ɔwui; wannya mma, na ɔgyaa ne yere maa ne nua.
Saa ara nso na deɛ ɔtɔ so mmienu ne mmiɛnsa no yɛeɛ de kɔduruu nson no soɔ.
Na wɔn nyinaa akyiri no, ɔbaa no nso wui.
Enti owusɔreɛ mu no, nnipa nson no mu hwan na ɔbɛyɛ ne yerɛ? Ɛfiri sɛ wɔn nyinaa aware no.
Na Yesu bua see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Mofom, na monnim twerɛ nsɛm ne Nyankopɔn tumi.
Owusɔreɛ mu no, wɔnware na wɔmma awadeɛ na wɔte sɛ abɔfoɔ wɔ soro.
Na ɛfa awufoɔ sɔreɛ ho deɛ, monkenkann deɛ Onyankopɔn kaeɛ no pɛn
sɛ: Mene Abraham Nyankopɔn ne Isak Nyankopɔn ne Yakob Nyankopɔn? Onyankopɔn nyɛ awufoɔ Nyankopɔn na mmom ateasefoɔ Nyankopɔn.

verse.content: Na nkurɔfoɔ akuakuo no teeɛ no, ne nkyerɛkyerɛ no yɛɛ wɔn ahodwiri.
Na Farisifoɔ no tee sɛ wamua Sadukifoɔ no ano no, wɔkɔhyiaa faako.
Na wɔn mu baako a ɔyɛ mmaranimfoɔ bisaa no de sɔɔ no hwɛɛ sɛ:
Kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ, mmara no mu kɛseɛ ne deɛ ɛwɔ he?
Na ɔsee no sɛ:

wj.content: Dɔ Awurade wo Nyankopɔn w’akoma nyinaa mu ne wo kra nyinaa mu ne w’adwene nyinaa mu!
Yei ne mmara no mu kɛseɛ ne deɛ ɛdi kan.
Na deɛ ɛtɔ so mmienu te sɛ ɛno: Dɔ wo yɔnko sɛ wo ho!
Mmara nsɛm mmienu yi so na mmara ne adiyifoɔ no nyinaa gyina.

verse.content: Na Farisifoɔ no hyiaeɛ no, Yesu bisaa wɔn
sɛ:

wj.content: Modwene Kristo no ho sɛn? Hwan ba ne no?

verse.content: Wɔsee no sɛ: Dawid.
Ɔbisaa wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Na afei adɛn na Dawid nam honhom mu frɛ no owura ka sɛ:
Awurade see me wura sɛ:
Tena me nifa
kɔsi sɛ mede w’atamfoɔ bɛgu wo nan ase?
Sɛ Dawid frɛ no owura a, na ɛyɛɛ dɛn na ɔyɛ ne ba?

verse.content: Na obiara antumi ammua no asɛm biara, nanso ɛfiri da no, obiara antumi ammisa no asɛm biara bio.
Ɛnna Yesu kasa kyerɛɛ nkurɔfoɔ akuakuo ne n’asuafoɔ no
sɛ:

wj.content: Mose akonnwa so na Atwerɛfoɔ ne Farisifoɔ atena.
Enti deɛ wɔbɛse mo sɛ monni soɔ no nyinaa, monni so na monyɛ. Na wɔn nnwuma deɛ, monnyɛ; ɛfiri sɛ wɔka, nanso wɔnyɛ.
Na wɔkyekyere nnesoa duruduro to nnipa mmatiri so; na wɔn ara deɛ, wɔmpɛ sɛ wɔde wɔn nsateaa mpo ka.
Na wɔyɛ wɔn nnwuma nyinaa sɛdeɛ nnipa bɛhu wɔn. Na wɔyɛ wɔn nkaeɛ nwoma atɛtrɛtɛ, na wɔyɛ wɔn ntadeɛ ano nnwo akɛseɛ.
Na wɔpɛ mpanimfoɔ tenaberɛ adidie ase, ne mpanimfoɔ nkonnwa hyia adan mu,
ne edwam nkyea, ne sɛ nnipa bɛfrɛ wɔn: Rabi!
